title: Must visit
text: The Alte Pinakothek is a must-visit in Munich. Many Italian and Flemish artists are exhibited here and on Sunday the ticket costs only 1 Euro. The neighborhood is plenty of bars and and parks where to chill.

title: Intéressant
text: Musée très intéressant avec des œuvres de toutes les époques. Priorité quand même à la renaissance et à Rubens. A voir dommage que certaines salles soient un peu petites.

title: Breathtaking
text: My other half suggested we visit here for the day so the little one stayed in bed and we visited on our own.  It's about a fifteen to twenty minute stroll from the train station.  The museum is vast with artworks on two levels.  I thin we paid about 14 Euros for the two of us and like with other museums we had to leave our bags in the lockers, for which there is a 1 Euro returnable deposit.  We started on the first floor by walking of a long steep flight of stairs.  The artworks went from the fifteenth up to the eighteenth century and contained lots of Italian works as well as art by Rembrandt, Van Dyke and Rubens, who works were wide and varied.  I think this is the largest Rubens collection outside his native country.  There were also other items by Raphael and Breugel.  the collection is vast and you need to take it all in as you walk round.  The rooms have all the doors removed so you can just walk through, and each room has lots of central seating so lovers can sit and admire the stunning works as they move round.  After completing the upstairs we went to the cafe for a spot of lunch and had coffee and cake.  I had Lavender cake and mum had a slice of lemon tart.  The portions were substantial and cost about 15 Euros in total.  All the tables in the cafe were respecting social distancing and the staff all has masks on, as did all the other staff on duty throughout the museum.   After lunch we visited the smaller collection on the ground floor of eighteenth and nineteenth century works.  this contained works by Monet, Manet, Cezanne, Degas, Gainsborough, Klimt, Rodin and an original of Van Gogh's Sunflowers.  Each painting was priceless.  I could have sat all day and admired this collection, beautiful is an understatement.  We were here for hours, the Rubens collection is magnificent on its own.  Anyone with an interest in European art needs to visit this place.  Entrance is cheap, the art is substantial and the collections are amazing.  Tourists to Munich must not pass this up an opportunity to visit this place.

title: Wonderful collection
text: Impressive collection, from Boucher to Rembrandt.  Rubens's Last Judgement alone worth the price of admission.  Highly recommend getting a guided tour, especially if you have kids/teenagers with you.  Like everywhere in Munich at the moment, masks are required inside.

text: König Ludwig I. war dem Ideal der Volksbildung verpflichtet. Er wollte die Kunstwerke aus der von Kurfürst Karl Theodors gegründeten Galerie im Hofgarten und die auf verschiedene Schlösser verteilten Bilder der Wittelsbacher, ergänzt durch zahlreiche Meisterwerke, die er durch

title: Einfach prachtvoll
text: Einfach phantastisch, man ist schier erschlagen von der Fülle der hochkarätigen Kunst. Meisterhaft präsentiert, das Cafe eine wohltuende Oase um Kraft zu schöpfen. Wunderschöne, passende Architektur. Ich kann nicht nachvollziehen, wie man das als " Durcheinander" bezeichnen kann, denn es werden ja Epochen präsentiert, und keine Katalogausstellung eines einzelnen Meisters.  Wir waren jedenfalls rundherum begeistert, auch von der zwanglosen Leichtigkeit, die das Museum mit sonnenbadenden auf dem gepflegten Rasen einrahmt. Alles andere als verknöchert akademisch. Und noch etwas : am Sonntag für 1€ pro Person in eine solch hochkarätige Sammlung eingelassen zu werden ( betrifft auch die neue Pin. und die Pin der Moderne ) ist einfach grandios. Da sollten sich mal Städte wie das sogenannte Elbflorenz Dresden eine Scheibe von abschneiden. So kann man auch als Familie mit Kindern Kunst genießen. Sehr gut !!!!

title: fantastica
text: Palazzo circondato dal verde, si articola su ampi corridoi su due piani. Audioguida scaricabile sul cellulare. Prezzo di domenica € 1. La sezione italiana, come sempre, è molto ricca e bellissima.

title: Sehr viele verschiedene schöne werke sind hier versammelt.
text: Wir kamen mit der Straßenbahn an und haben fast den ganzen Tag (über 5 Stunden) in den Pinotheken verbracht. Viele verschiedene schöne Werke sind hier ausgestellt!!!

title: Immer wieder schön, die AltenMeister
text: Wir dachten, dass die Cortona-Beschränkungen uns behindern würden, aber so wenig Besucher haben wir in der Alten Pinakothek noch nie gesehen.War ein wunderbares Wiedersehen mit unseren Lieblingsbildern!

title: Masse statt Klasse
text: Hier hängen sehr viele Bilder durcheinander und manche über einander.  Dies wirkt sehr unübersichtlich.  Zudem sind natürlich die Aufsichtspersonal Chaoten.  Wenn man gerne in einer Flohmarkt geht, ist man hier gut aufgehoben.  Ja, es gibt ein paar Schätze zwischen den Gruscht.

title: Класс
text: Около семисот полотен представлены в девятнадцати залах и сорока девяти кабинетах музея в рамках постоянной экспозиции.Отличительной особенностью этого музея является отсутствие среди экспонатов произведений скульптуры, графики либо предметов прикладного искусства и старинной мебели, которые обычно любят разместить в своих залах музеи. В пинакотеке строго выдерживается основной принцип коллекционирования: на стенах и стендах её находятся только картины.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Крупнейшая в мире картинная галерея.
text: Старая пинакотека (греч. «хранилище для досок или картин») - крупнейшая в мире картинная галерея. В Старой пинакотеке хранятся произведения художников, живших во времена Средневековья и до 18 века. На двух этажах в 19 залах и 49 кабинетах выставлены почти 700 картин (Рафаэля, Леонардо да Винчи, Альбрехта Дюрера, Босха, Рембранта, Рубенса). Огромная коллекция была собрана представителями легендарной династии Виттельсбахов, которые на протяжении 700 лет правили Баварией. Билет для взрослых стоит 7 евро.

title: molto ampia con parecchi quadri
text: Sono stato a visitare la vecchia pinacoteca con mia moglie.Al primo piano ci sono poche ma interessanti stanze.Al secondo invece le stanze sono molto numerose. Al suo interno sono presenti (almeno attualmente) anche alcuni quadri di impressionisti come manet, monet e van gogh.

title: Splendidi capolavori
text: La fermata della metro è vicina all'intero complesso museale. In metro arriviamo alla Kunstareal  (area dell'arte) dove si trovano altri musei. Noi preferiamo solo l’Alte Pinakothek. Sono le 15:30 entriamo senza trovare grande folla. Così come previsto il biglietto costa 1€ perché è domenica (negli altri giorni costa 7€). Al biglietto aggiungiamo l’audioguida (5€). Cominciamo dal piano superiore. Il museo è grande e lo percorriamo secondo un itinerario logico altrimenti sarebbe facile disorientarsi e perdere il filo. All’interno si trovano capolavori di ogni parte d’Europa e di ogni epoca. Trovo anche i miei preferiti, Gauguin, Cezanne e persino una delle versioni dei Girasoli di Van Gogh. Uno dei capolavori è il grande giudizio universale di Rubens. Come detto è molto grande ed è bene affidarsi alla piantina da prendere in biglietteria. Dopo il primo piano andiamo al piano terra. La visita finisce dopo poco più di due ore ed è stato un’immersione culturale bellissima. Uno dei più bei musei visti finora. Si possono fare foto senza flash. Tutti i quadri sono protetti da un vetro antisfondamento e antiriflesso dopo che nel 1988 uno squilibrato verso dell'acido ad uno dei dipinti di Durer.

title: Un maravilloso paseo por la historia del arte.
text: Para quien ame la pintura, este lugar es, lejos, lo mejor de Munich, como me sucedió a mí. Lo mejor de todo es que, al contrario de otras galerías que se llenan demasiado, esta pinacoteca -al menos a la hora que yo acudí (a las 3:00 pm, tres horas antes del cierre)- no recibe hordas de turistas, por lo cual es posible apreciar las pinturas sin las incómodas aglomeraciones. La verdad es que uno podría estar un día entero aquí, sobretodo utilizando las audioguías -que la pinacoteca facilita en forma gratuita-, pero si se tiene poco tiempo, es recomendable concentrare solo en aquellas obras que son calificadas como puntos altos por el folleto guía confeccionado por la propia Pinacoteca Antigua.

title: Große Sammlung großer Meister
text: Sehr umfangreiche Sammlung.Große Werke  gut präsentiert.Das Haus gehört international mit in die erste Kategorie.

title: Una sorpresa.
text: Confesso, avevo mezza giornata da riempire a Monaco, mia figlia ha proposto la pinacoteca di Monaco, che non conoscevo. Ingresso di domenica a 1 euro e sorpresa, mi sono trovato opere in ordine sparso di Monet, Manet, Van Gogh, Segantini, Raffaello, Leonardo, Botticelli, Canaletto, Rubens, Tiziano, Arcimboldo, Antonello da Messina. Sale immense con dipinti alle pareti. Tutto molto bello, da rimanere rapiti.  Consigliatissimo.

title: 小巧的名畫中心
text: 比較起其他國家美術館  這裡顯然較為小巧不過所搜集的名畫精緻與多件大尺寸作品都值得細細欣賞美術館的營業時間到晚上八點  是個晚間的好去處

title: Das Kombiticket für 12euro fünf Musen an einem Tag
text: Mein Favorit die Alte Pinakothek enttäuscht nie, die neue war geschlossen die Moderne hatte ich schon, Brandhorst war ganz nett und jetzt geht es zur Sammlung Schack.

title: Обязательное место
text: Человек, считающий себя культурным и образованным, обязан побывать в этом месте. Огромная коллекция мировых шедевров от мастеров Возрождения до экспрессионистов. Вход - 7 Евро.

title: ドイツらしい直線の美しい美術館
text: 皆さんが書いている通り、現在はノイエピナコテークの展示品が改装工事の影響で一部がアルテピナコテークに来ているのでお得です。それらがなかった場合は大迫力の宗教画を楽しむことになります。ドイツの画家ではないですが、ヴァンダイクやレンブラントが沢山あり、またそれら以外にも巨大な宗教画に圧倒されると思います。因みに美術館時代も直線を多用した大変美しいものです。建物も是非愛でて見てください。

title: Культурный отдых
text: Коллекция очень разнообразная. Много известных имён, но работы мало известные. Два этажа. На вернем этаже старые мастера. В каждом зале есть диванчики, куда можно присесть и любоваться картинами. Кроме того при входе можно взять переносные складные стулья. Устал - присел, любуешься. В воскресенье билет стоит 1 евро.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Treated like an outlaw
text: All was well until a staff member approached my wife and pointed out the size of her purse (after being in the museum for a couple hours). I told him, in German, my wife does not speak German. He only spoke much louder in German causing other patrons to stare.I'll have to try speaking louder when someone does not understand the language I am speaking.

title: Мюнхен, старая пинокатека
text: Если вы в Мюнхене больше 3х, то обязательно нужно посетить ( даже , если вы не особый ценитель).Коллекция просто поражает своим масштабом, я заранее загрузила бесплатный аудиагид на телефон, поэтому перед некоторыми картинами зависала надолго.Конечно, посещать приятнее в воскресенье, входной билет за 1 евро греет душу)
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lohnt sich
text: Kultur, dann mal eien Tag dort einplanen. Ich war im Sommer 2019 da und man kann ganz in Ruhe sich dort alles anschauen.

title: Старая Пинакотека в Мюнхене
text: Удобные часы работы: с 10 аж до 20.30 в некоторые  будни.Выходной-поеедельник.Плата-разумная, дети до 18 лет-свободное посещение.Обширная коллекция выдающихся произведений живописи!!!Широко представлены Рубенс, Тинторетто, Дюрер и ряд других художников. Небольшой раздел посвящен известным импрессионистам: несколько картин Ван Гога, Мане, Сезанна, Дега .Аудиогида на русском языке нет.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Tour of the past
text: Do take the Audio Guide. It helps explain each painting and each room as you step back into history. The paintings are stunning. Totally in awe of the talent 'way back then'. I closed the place!

title: Très intéressant
text: Nous avons visité ce musée un Dimanche et n'avons payé l'entrée qu'un €uro par personne, car le Dimanche les musées d'état à Munich ce visite pour cette somme!

title: Ван Дейк в Старой пинакотеке
text: Старая пинакотека обязательна к посещению и сама по себе, тем более, что попасть туда можно за символическую цену в один евро. Она обладает впечатляющим собранием "старых мастеров", в том числе таких символических, как Дюрер, Рафаэль и Леонардо да Винчи.  Но на этом ее богатства не исчерпываются. Ботичелли, Рембрант, Рубенс, Тициан и все известнейшие мастера с удобством расположились в просторных залах.Временные выставки соответствуют высокому уровню пинакотеки, несущей в современность знание и понимание художественных достижений прошлых веков. Нам повезло попасть на Ван Дейка (стоимость посещения 12 евро, соответствует цене посещения большинства европейских музеев). Работы мастера были представлены в нескольких ракурсах - учителя, современники, авторские копии. Нет смысла рассказывать о выставке подробнее, ее надо видеть. Это именно тот случай, когда гениальность художника раскрывается через профессионализм его исследователей.

title: Супер! Идите обязательно!
text: 7 евро билет, 1 евро гардероб, и вы будете помнить этот визит!Отличная коллекция!Голландцы, немного импрессионистов, рубенс аж до усталости, Рафаэль , да винчи, тициан.Очень понравилось, уже второй раз прихожу, и все нравится.

title: Die Alte Pinakothek
text: König Ludwig I ließ die Alte Pinakothek erbauen,  die Eröffnung fand 1836 statt. In den Sälen befinden sich Gemälde des Mittelalters, der Renaissance, des Barocks und des Rokokos.Werke von Dürer, Rubens, Rembrandt, Cranach, Altdorfer, Botticelli,Tizian, Raffael,da Vinci und vielen anderen bedeutenden Malern. Im 2. Weltkrieg wurde die Pinakothek stark beschädigt und war lange Zeit geschlossen. Regelmäßig finden Sonderausstellungen in der Alten Pinakothek statt. Zur Zeit ist die Neue Pinakothek wegen Renovierungsarbeiten geschlossen, deshalb befinden sich viele Gemälde der Neuen Pinakothek in der Alten Pinakothek und können dort besichtigt werden.

title: Старая пинакотека
text: Старая пинакотека- художественный музей, открытый в 1836 году, находится в Мюнхенском художественном квартале, является одной из самых важных художественных галерей в мире. Здесь выставлены картины художников от средневековья до середины 18 века. Особенно понравилась немецкая живопись 14-17 веков, которая в Эрмитаже в Санкт-Петербурге практически не представлена: Альбрехта Дюрера, Мартина Шонгауэра, Альбрехта  Альтдорфера, Лукаса Кранаха Старшего, Адама Эльшаймера. Билет стоит 7 евро. Можно купить на память книгу «Старая пинакотека, Мюнхен» на русском языке. Сходите, посмотрите, не пожалеете!

title: Unfreundliche und dreistes Personal
text: Ist es möglich als Kunstkenner von einem Haus mit derart hochkarätigen Werken enttäuscht zu werden? Leider ja.Selten habe ich mich auf ein Museum so gefreut. Zunächst zur Van Dyck Austellung. Die Austellung ist überraschend klein, dennoch gut kuriert und schöne Werke. Das riesen Manko war das Personal in der Sonderausstellung. Mir sind die Regeln des Fotografieren in Museen geläufig. Egal ob Louvre in Paris das Kunsthistorische Museum in Wien oder die Eremitage in St Petersburg, in keinem dieser Museen gab es Probleme mit dem Wachpersonal. Vermutlich war dem in München langweilig und er versuchte mit mir aggressiv zu diskutieren. Mir ist klar das fotografieren nur ohne Blitz erlaubt ist. Die meisten Kameras haben eine kleine orangene oder rote LED vorne welches vor dem Foto kurz aufleuchtet. Dies hat keinerlei Auswirkung auf Ölgemälde und war auch in der Daueraustellung keinerlei Problem. In der Sonderausstellung jedoch anscheinend schon. Im Endeffekt habe ich das Museum selbst verlassen. Das Museum sollte entweder das Personal korrekt Schulen oder einheitlich informieren. Ich fand es eine absolute Frechheit derart mit Besuchern umzugehen. Ich kann dir Bewertungen, die teilweise auf Facebook immer wieder gelöscht werden, absolut nachvollziehen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Временная выставка Ван Дейка.Temporary exhibition of Van Dyck.
text: Саму Пинакотеку посещали много раз. Особенно интересно посещать временные экспозиции, куда специально привозят полотна какого-либо художника из других музеев мира. На этот раз экспозиция называлась "Молодой Ван Дейк". Кроме полотен Ван Дейка были представлены также несколько полотен Рубенса, его учителя и Тициана. Выставка хоть и не очень объемная, но впечатляет. Единственное, претензии к освещению- и смотреть тяжело с разных ракурсов- иногда нечетко, иногда не все видно, элементы полотен отсвечивают и фотографии получаются не всегда четкие. Сувенирный шоп просто шикарный.

title: Spectacular Collection
text: The Alte Pinakothek contains an extensive collection of artwork from the 15th through 18th Centuries.  features many artists  from Germany and the Low Countries, including Rubens, Rembrandt, Durer, Bosch, Holbein, and other very well known painters.  As of January 2020, the Neue Pinakothek, which houses great 19th and 20th Century art, was closed for maintenance, so a selection of works from that Museum was also in the Alte.  The great Impressionist and Post-Impressionists were well represented.  After the Neue opens, I recommend that you go there as well.All in all, a world-class Museum.

title: Beautiful art to some extent overwhelming
text: A fascinating and very large collection of paintings from around 14C to 19C. Multitude of masterpieces and you can spend hours there. The challenge is that it is a real large collection, so there are just so many paintings of the same motif and after a while I lost the appetite for paintings of Madonna and child and Christ on the cross, let alone the dosens of paintings by Rubens (has he really painted all these + the hundreds you find by him in other museums around the world??). Go for the good stuff and in managed doses.

title: Пинакотека – лучшее занятие в Мюнхене в дождливую погоду. Музей исскуств.
text: Мы провели в галлереях Пинакотеки значительно больше времени, чем изначально планировали. И тем не менее, посмотрели не всё – устали. Жаль, что не владеем ни немецким, ни английским языками, потому что ходить от картины к картине с аудиогидом было бы значительно интереснее(русского аудиогида, увы, нет). В залах первого этажа фотографировать не разрешают, а на верхних, - полотна великих итальянцев,- можно. С удовольствием пересматриваю дома эти фотографии, перевожу со словарём описания картин. Стоит заглянуть и в сувенирную лавку при музее,в ней отличные тематические сувениры - открытки, брошюры для любого возраста.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Прекрасное дополнение отдыха.
text: Заходили на "сложном маршруте" Мюнхен-Берлин. Полностью оправдывает ожидания. Старые мастера - библейские мотивы, ну а дальше -больше!! Леонардо, Рафаэль, Рембрант, Босх, Дюрер, Рубенс, Тициан, Ван Дейк и Ботичелли, Эль Греко и Веласкес ! Никогда не думал, что это великолепие так доступно! 3 или 5 евро... и Вуаля!Ну а на первом этаже ждали Мане и Моне, Ван Гог и Гоген, Климт и Роден...Я не забуду этого никогда.Организовано все четко и правильно, как должна быть организована галерея.На первом есть кафе, сувениры и прочее.

title: Avrupa'nın önemli sanat müzelerinden biri
text: Bir arada yer alan sanat müzesi kompleksinde bulunuyor. Büyük tarihi bir bina içinde çok iyi düzenlenmiş zengin bir koleksiyon. Gittiğimiz zaman onarımda olan Neue Pinakotek içinde yer alan önemli eserlerin bir kısmı da alt katında sergileniyordu.  Avrupa içinde önemli  sanat müzelerinden biri. Ortaçağdan rönesansa kadar, başta Alman Dürer olmak üzere pek çok sanatçının resim ve heykelleri sergileniyor. Pazar günleri giriş 1 Avro, pazartesi kapalı.

title: Espetacular
text: Um dos melhores museus da Europa, contando com acervo incrível - Goya, Rembrandt, Da Vinci, Botticelli, Bosch, Van Gogh, Klimt - todos estão lá. Entrada por 7 euros.

title: Uno dei più famosi al mondo
text: Il biglietto d'ingresso costa 7€ (la domenica soltanto 1€), si tratta di uno dei musei più importanti al mondo in cui ammirare opere di Leonardo, Raffaello, Botticelli, Durer, Rubens e Tiziano. Andrebbe secondo me organizzata meglio poichè sembra che le opere siano esposte a caso senza un vero senso. Inoltre a causa della ristrutturazione della Neue Pinakothek le opere più famose di Manet, Monet e Van Gogh sono ospitate al piano terra. Praticamente si visitano 2 musei al prezzo di uno soltanto

title: Hermosas obras de Neue Pinakothek
text: Para quienes lamentan, como yo, el cierre de la Neue Pinakothek por reparaciones (hasta 2025), recomiendo visitar la Alte Pinakothek. Allí se ha montado una exhibición con algunas de sus más extraordinarias e importantes obras.

title: Why do people pose next to the paintings
text: It never ceases to amaze me how many people look at the paintings of the great masters, instead of feeling the artist work. Just enjoy it and put the phone down.

title: Da non perdere
text: Grande pinacoteca con una vasta raccolta di opere molto interessanti e pregevoli tra cui figurano quelle di numerosi artisti  del rinascimento italiano e non solo.La visita all pinacoteca credo sia un must nel corso di un tour culturale per Monaco di Baviera.

title: Für die alle, die Malerei mögen

title: Impressive Gallery!
text: I've been to a few museums in Europe and I like how quiet and open the Alte Pinakothek is compared to the Louvre where you feel like you're in a can of sardines half the time; this is probably due to the fact that I visited towards the end of the day, but even still I feel like this place would have normally have less crowds at its peak as well. The architecture is really lovely and though it was originally built in the 1800s, it was bombed during World War II and the interior is more simplified than what it was before while still leaving a grand impression. The stairs and hallways leading to the upper galleries have this sort of modern/Art Deco vibe that is beautiful to behold. The gallery itself has many of the great masters as one would expect, including artists that I don't normally find back home in America (at least not on the West Coast) like Albrecht Dürer, Gustav Klimt, and of course Leonardo Da Vinci. And while I have seen paintings from artists like Rubens and Rembrandt back in museums where I live, there are entire rooms dedicated to these artists and some of their works are extremely massive, going from the floor to the ceiling in epic fashion. The Neue Pinakothek is closed for renovations, so they moved some of their best work to this museum for the time being which is how I was able to come across Gustav Klimt, along with other more modern artists like Van Gogh, Manet, and Cézanne in the lower galleries. Definitely worth a visit to quench your thirst for art!

title: Respectable collection of European Old Masters
text: We recently visited Munich and enjoyed a return to the Alte Pinakothek (Old Masters Art Gallery) at Kunstareal (Museum District) in Munich. Opening hours are 10am to 6pm (Tues to Sun) with extended hours to 8.30pm on Wednesday. Note the museum is closed on Mondays. Note: Entry fee is €7 per adult and includes an audio guide which is very useful for learning about various artworks and the Old Masters who painted the masterpieces on display at Munich's Alte Pinakothek. During our previous visit in 2018 much of the museum was under renovation work. We were glad to find these restorations completed and the full accompaniment of upstairs galleries available for art viewing. The museum collection includes numerous works from the 13th to 18th century with particular focus on Italian, Flemish primitive, Dutch Golden Age and Old German art genres. You can enjoy works by Italians such of Fra Angelica, Leonardo Da Vinci, Raphael, Botticelli, Veronese and Titian. There is a very good collection of Flemish and Dutch masterpieces by Peter Paul Rubens, Adriaen Brouwer, Rembrandt, Hals, Pieter Bruegel the Elder as well as a large holding of works by German artists such as Albrecht Durer and Lucas Cranach the Elder amongst many others. It is quite easy to spend a couple hours art viewing in the upper floor galleries. Note that the ground floor area of the museum presently has an Anthony Van Dyke exhibition as well as a fair number of rooms dedicated to masterpieces from the Neue Pinakothek which have been temporarily moved here while that museum undergoes restoration works. Tip: The Die Pinakotheken museums in Munich are only €1 to visit on Sundays so try visit 2-3 on the day if you are a museum lover and want to save a bit on museum entry fees.

title: Fantastic art museum!
text: I have traveled to Europe many times and have hit most of the "major" art museums in Europe. Munich's Alte Pinothek should be up there with the National Gallery in London or the Louvre. But because it isn't so well-noted or visited, you get to actually enjoy the vast collection without jockeying for position or fighting crowds. The collection focuses mostly on northern Europe with the Flemish and Dutch well represented, with the usual Rembrandts, Van Dycks and Franz Hals. In fact, the museum has 49 Reubens which helps you appreciate his versatility and artistry. But  southern Europe is not ignored and Titian, Tintoretto and Raphael well-represented (and even a Da Vinci!) from Italy. If you go to Munich, the Alte Pinothek should be on your list of "must-dos". You may be as pleasantly surprised as I was.

Although there were big queues in the entrance hall, it was still possible to look at all the paintings without having to queue. As there are so many stunning works, there is no need for folks to crowd round a few treasures. Thoroughly recommended.

title: Für  jeden der Kunst mag ein wichtiger Besuchspunkt in München
text: Insgesamt ein großes tolles Museum. Beim Betreten der Eingangshalle fällt einem die schlichte Architektur auf. Diese hält sich sehr zurück. Als erstes habe ich mir die Ersatzaustellung für die geschlossene Pinakothek angeschaut. Schon sehr hochkarätig besetzt. Anschliessend zur aktuellen van Dyk Ausstellung. Spannend waren hier die Parallelen zur aktuellen Ausstellung im kunsthistorischen Museum in Wien. Bildgestaltung und Themen waren ähnlich und es gab ähnliche Bildaufbauten. Es war toll beide Ausstellungen zu vergleichen. Dann kam die erste Etage mit der eigentlichen Hauptausstellung. Eine Reise durch den Barock mit vielen Highlights der Kunstgeschichte. Gerade die großartigen Bilder waren atemberaubend. Die Sicherheitsbeamten waren Leier fast immer mit sich selbst, mit der Pausenreglung oder mit einer Unterhaltung beschäftigt. Dies minderte den eigentlichen Besuch doch etwas.

Es hat sich wohl nicht rumgesprochen, dass seit 2010 ein Gesetz dies verbietet:  §1 Abs. 1 S. 3 PAuswG: "Vom Ausweisinhaber darf nicht verlangt werden, den Personalausweis zu hinterlegen oder in sonstiger Weise den Gewahrsam aufzugeben."

title: 見ごたえ十分な美の殿堂
text: 北方ルネサンスのデューラーやルーベンスの大作を中心に、ラファエロ、ボッティチェリといったルネサンス時代の作品や（現時点では）閉鎖中の近代絵画館からゴッホやマネが展示されていて、見ごたえ十分です。日曜日はわずか1ユーロの特別会館も行われていました。

title: Wonderful Art
text: If you love classical, renaissance, impressionist, etc. art (you name it) - this is the place for you. Extensive collection and worth a visit - van Gogh (sunflowers!), da Vinci, Rodin, and so many more. I really enjoyed my time at this museum and highly recommend it. I started with the old world masterpieces and went almost backwards - and by getting there right when it opened and doing this, fewer people were around, which made it even better (up the stairs and go to the right to start). Then go downstairs and see the impressionist and other art.I was able to see the whole place in an hour at a decent pace (I was meeting up with people who went to another museum, so we set a finish time). You could easily spent at least two hours in here though!

title: One of the great art museums of Europe
text: The Alte Pinakothek is known for its superb collection of paintings from the Middle Ages to the 18th century. At that point we used to cross the road to visit the Neue PInakothek, which takes viewers into the twentieth century. The NP is closed for the next 6 years for renovations, however, and a selection of its works is now on view in the AP, adding to its attraction. It was good to see several of the works of Caspar David Friedrich in the same building that holds some of my favourite works of German and Netherlandish art: paintings by Gossaert, Dürer, Altdorfer, Brueghel, Cranach, Rembrandt, Van Goyen, Rubens etc. What a treasure trove!

title: Looking for an art museum and found one.
text: Lots of religious paintings by old masters but also several more modern works by Impressionists such as Van Gogh.

title: ミュンヘンでもつともお得な観光場所
text: ミュンヘンには素晴らしいミュジアムが数々ありますが、その中でももつとも有名なのが Alte Pinakothek 絵画館です。レオナルド ダヴィンチ、ラファエロ、アルフレッド Dürr, ルーベンス、レンブラント等々の名画がずらりとならんで展示されています。その上、今年の夏からノイピナコテクが改装に入り、そちらのおもだつた作品が現在 ALTE PINAKOTEKに展示されています。Vincent Van Gogh, ゴーギャン、セザンヌ、モネ、マネ等々の印象派などが€7の 入場料で見る事が出来ます。そして 日曜日は入場料はタツタの€1‼️です。たまたま日曜日にミュンヘンに滞在なさつて居られるなら、ぜひアルテ ピナコテクへ行かれる事をお勧めします。タツタ€1で世界の有名な絵画が見られます。無猫

title: Completa
text: Pinacoteca che racchiude un sunto della storia dell'arte dal medioevo al novecento. Non eccessivamente grande ma completa. Molti artisti italiani da Botticelli a Raffaello a Leonardo a Canaletto.  Anche diversi Giotto. E poi tutti gli altri dei vari paesi e correnti europee. Merita sicuramente.

title: An Extensive Collection
text: The Alte Pinkothek has an extensive collection of paintings by many European masters. Definitely worth a visit.

title: Great, but small collection, worth a visit...
text: Great, but small collection, worth a visit...Small collection, one of the galleries is closed for renovation but the modern paintings ie Van Gogh have been moved here. Impressive building and nice for the rainy day we had..
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wonderful collection!
text: What a wonderful collection of Northern Renaissance art! Truly thrilling to see such amazing masterpieces.

title: Nice art museum
text: A nice and attractive art museum in Munich in which you can see significant old master paintings. I recomend it to everyone who interested in art and painting.

title: Visit this museum for Old Master paintings
text: I visited on a Sunday so the ticket was only EUR1. Exhibits are arranged over 2 floors and most have a short description in English so I didn't feel an audioguide was necessary.

title: Prachtige collectie in een mooi gebouw.
text: Vlaamse primitieven, Raphel, Titaan, Rubens en ook nog een Leonardo. Kortom veel topwerken op een aantal m2.

title: Kunstcollectie bekijken
text: Mooie omgeving en ook deze keer speciale presentatie van werk van Utrechtse schilders. Interessante info via de koptelefoon en ook diverse mooie schilderijen

title: great collection of christian art
text: the museum holds a great collection of christian art. a lovely cafe victorian house awaits you for your break after a heavy tour of the old arts.

title: suprise for me
text: A lot of masterpieces inside, Dürer, Tizian, Tintoretto, Rembrandt, Rubens, Van Dyck, Goya, Manet, Van Gogh........

title: A Splendid Museum
text: They have a large number of Durers, old Flemish masters, Dutch still life paintings, two rooms filled with works of Rubens, etc. The audioguide, which comes with the five euro admission, has intelligent and interesting commentary.  The museum staff was helpful and understood English as well as broken German.After three hours we had not seen half of the museum: We'll see the rest on our next visit.

title: Beautiful Collection
text: Alte Pinakothek has a wonderful collection of paintings. Botticelli, Titian, Rembrandt, Holbein, a huge Rubens collection and many more artists are represented here. It was not crowded when we were there on a weekday. Alte currently has a small selection of paintings from the Neue Pinakothek while Neue is being renovated.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Отличный художественный музей!
text: Огромная коллекция старых мастеров. Можно посещать с детьми в коляске, есть лифты. Даже пропустили к кассе без очереди. Правда в музее рекомендуют соблюдать тишину, поэтому ребёнка всё время нужно чём-то занимать чтобы не шумел. Хорошее  кафе на первом этаже, можно попить кофе или перекусить между просмотрами. Вкусно и дорого. Нам ещё повезло что нашли столик, в выходные там битком.Коллекция просто потрясающая - Рембрандт, Тициан, Рубенс, Веласкес. Очень рекомендую к посещению!

title: Visita obligada si te gusta la pintura
text: Alberga una magnífica coleccion que va desde el medievo hasta el siglo XIX. Durero, Goya, Botticelli, Rubens, Rembrandt, Van Dyck, Velázquez, Van Gogh, Tiziano, etc.,etc.Es una colección inmensa con obras magníficas si eres amante de la pintura.Necesitarás, al menos, 2 horas para poder verlo.Se permite hacer fotografías sin flash

title: Beatiful collection
text: Beautiful and very concise collection, easy to browse through. While Neue Pinakothek is in renovation, it's main exhibits are housed in Alte, so we were able to see both in one visit.

title: Rubens come non l'avete mai visto
text: Se amate l'arte come me e siete in vacanza a Monaco di Baviera, non potete non visitare questo splendido museo. Quì potrete ammirare le opere di Rubens e tanti altri artisti fiamminghi, espressione di un 'arte unica nel suo genere, e poi ancora Leonardo, Raffaello e Antonello da Messina e molti altri del rinascimento italiano.Tutta l'esposizione nel complesso è stata molto interessante.Per  visitare il museo vi potete avvalere dell' audio guida in italiano, compresa nel prezzo di ingresso  7 euro gli adulti - gratis under 18; altrimenti,  contattando il museo c'è la possibilità di  prenotare una guida privata e personalizzata in italiano con un esperto d'arte, prezzo 130 euro per due ore (più l'entrata). Noi ci siamo fatti un regalo e abbiamo scelto questa seconda opzione, la dott.ssa Marano che ci ha accompagnato nel percorso ha parlato per ben 2 ore spiegandoci veramente ogni dettaglio delle opere che abbiamo visitato, facendo collegamenti storici, e incantandoci con ogni sua spegazione e racconto. Siamo rimasti davvero stupefatti e ancora la ringraziamo per la sua professionalità. Se scegliete questa seconda possibilità, al termine della visita guidata potete comunque continuare il vostro percorso con l'audioguida.

title: Great art museum
text: Huge collection of paintings, many by very famous painters. Not overly crowded. There’s a free audio tour with the entrance fee but it only applies to a small portion of the paintings and each segment is too long. I’d prefer there be more audio segments with shorter descriptions. However, a lot of the paintings have written descriptions. Enjoyed this museum!

title: Topstukken, topdrukte...
text: Prachtige collectie met ook enkele topstukken van Van Gogh en Cezanne aangezien de Neue Pinakothek in renovatie is. Geweldig kunstmuseum dat de moeite meer dan waard is om te bezoeken. Echter een minpunt: de grote, door gidsen begeleide groepen hielden zich amper aan de regels van het museum op gebied van fotografie en afstand tot de schilderijen. Een keer kan dat gebeure maar het gebeurde met grote regelmaat met als gevolg dat het alarm bijna constant afging. Verder een top georganiseerd museum met goede teksten. Op zondag entree 1 euro!

title: Un musée de peinture incontournable
text: Cet endroit, conçu pour mettre en valeur les collections du XV au début XIXème, offre aux visiteurs des salles de tailles différentes adaptées à la surface des tableaux, regroupés par époque..

title: Sad memory.
text: Few days ago, I visited museum Alte pinakothek with my wife and my little baby.We would like to leave this comment since it left me and my wife an negative impression on such a wonderful place.At that time, in the entrance, we luckly met a reception guy who speaks italian and got info and payed for our entry.Then, after we finished watching pieces in the museum, we were almost leaving the place to go for dinner.As our first time visit Munich, we had no idea or restaurants. So I asked my wife to go and ask that guy for some recommendation on the restaurants. However, after my wife got his suggestion, this receptionist strangely asked my wife "are you married?" . When my wife came back, she told me about that small but strange conversation. We were disappointed on the fact we finally ended up with this strange emotion attached with the place.Then I just went back to the reception and talk to him to get away of any doubt, but finally the fact waited for me was something embarrassed us more.I asked first him in English "Did you asked my wife if she is married?",  he said "but you are her husband right?" This answer was not to the point for me.He can say that because during our entry payment, we were clearly together and he checked also our baby, and we explained  this is the member. And at the moment just few people in the line or we were almost the only group.So, I asked again "... You know I am her husband, but then when she came here to ask you something,  you asked my wife if she is married?" Then he answered "..yes" I was confused.. and sad.  I wanted to finish talk, so I asked him if it was just a jorking. And he did small yes.I had no idea what to say.Such a beautiful place where it must give an opportunity to impress lots people, cannot be happened things get people down who thanked for that opportunity by not appropriate service.We were one of many people having been looking for the moment to see great pieces there. We actually waited for it for months.Then it actually impressed us.My wife did not understand it and I, as her husband, it confuse me.Sadly depressed and the negative impression will be attached to the good memory.On the way back, we had no talk, we were strangely in sad mood.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Returning post renovation
text: I was here 2 years ago when the collection was restricted due to renovation.  We returned yesterday & it really is a magnificent snapshot of European art & a great collection to visit.  It’s worth €7 just to pop in & see their Durers (including the famous self portrait) but there’s plenty more to see & it won’t disappoint.New cafe & shop make for a great visit.Far better collection than many of the more famous European galleries & a definite for art lovers.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: UNA DE LAS MEJORES DEL MUNDO
text: Esta gran Pinacoteca alberga unas de las colecciones más importantes de mundo, en donde en sus salas, por cierto espléndidamente estructuradas, albergan los más importante pintores desde el medievo hasta el siglo XIX. Para muestra, podemos decir que está Durero, Giotto, Goya, Ribera, Botticelli, Rembrandt, Van Dyck, Velázquez, Murillo, Tiziano, y un largo etcétera de pintores.Duración aproximada de la visita: 2 horas.Entrada: Si.Fotografías: Si.

title: 意外にコンパクトな美の殿堂
text: ドイツルネサンスの粋を集めた美術館 しかしデューラー アルトドルファー、クラーナハだけでなくルーベンス ブリューゲルは勿論ラファエロ ボッテチェリ のイタリア絵画 プーシェなどのロココまで 幅広いコレクションを堪能できます 名作には事欠きませんが プーシェのポンパドールは必見です 全体にコンパクトで2時間でゆっくり回れます ノイエピナコテークが工事中なので その収蔵も2025年まで見られます 結構お得かも ミュンヘンで外せないspotです
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: ノイエ・ピナコテークの作品も一部展示あり
text: 好みのラファエロ「テンピの聖母」、レオナルド・ダ・ヴィンチ「聖母子」、リッピ「聖母子」を見に行きました。デューラー「四人の使徒」も大きく、迫力のある作品でした。数は少ないですが、現在閉館中のノイエ・ピナコテークの作品も一部展示されており、ゴッホ「ひまわり」やマネ、モネの作品が展示されていました。八月でしたが平日だったこともあってか、それほど混んでおらず、気にいった作品をじっくりと鑑賞することができました。

title: Hengästyttävän hieno museo
text: Uskomattomat kokoelmat Rubensia, Tintorettoa, Veronesea, Albrecht Düreriä. Mielestäni parempi museo kuin Berliinin Kulturforumin Gemäldegalleria. Suosittelen.

title: Un museo sottovalutato ma tutto da esplorare
text: Ho approfittato di mezza giornata a Monaco per visitare questa pinacoteca nella zona universitaria. Non sono esperta d'arte, ma l'esposizione è decisamente interessante da visitare. Ci sono molte opere di pittori famosi dal medioevo fino alla prima metà del 900. Sono stata 4 ore con audio guida in italiano e sono volate; ho acquistato anche la raccolta allo shop visto che ho incontrato nel percorso molte opere degne di nota, da Leonardo a Rubens, da Raffaello a Tiziano ecc. Vale sicuramente la pena visitarlo.

title: Galleria d’arte
text: La collezione di questo museo ospita numerosi capolavori che possono essere apprezzati maggiormente con la spiegazione dell’audioguida compresa nel prezzo (intero 7€ - gratis under18)

title: L'Arte vale sempre il viaggio
text: E' una delle gallerie più importanti al mondo, amerete Rubens come non mai e il viaggio vale solo per vedere il primo Leonardo che a 20 anni dipingeva la Madonna con il garofano , genio ifinito

title: Una grande pinacoteca
text: Il museo è una grande pinacoteca. Si sviluppa su due piani. Vi sono quadri di tantissimi artisti, per lo più sconosciuti. Quelli conosciuti hanno solo uno o due quadri tranne Rubens che ha un'intera sala. Il quadro più famoso, al momento,  sono i girasoli di Van Gogh. La domenica l'ingresso costa un euro.

title: L'arte non stanca mai
text: Ricca di opere illustri, la Vecchia Pinacoteca, è sicuramente una tappa d'obbligo per chi visita Monaco. La visita è gradevole e non troppo lunga. Le ampie sale si susseguono e invitano chi osserva ad ammirare le bellissime opere conservate in questo luogo magico. Potrebbe essere maggiormente curata l'idea di una visita meno improntata sulla semplice osservazione, valorizzando l'interazione con le opere e con la vita degli artisti che le hanno realizzate nel corso della storia.

title: Ein absolutes "Muss"
text: Begeisternd! Man trifft Bilder im Original, die man durch andere Medien eigentlich schon lange kennt und die man endlich mal mit eigenen Augen sehen kann!Durch Umbaumassnahmen in der Neuen Pinakothek werden die wichtigsten Stücke in den Räumen der A.P. gezeigt . (ohne Mehrkosten)

title: Посетить обязательно
text: Каждый путешественник должен посетить этот музей. Если вы хоть что-то знаете о живописи, то перед вами даже не будет стоять такой вопрос...прийти сюда нужно обязательно. Если вы далеки от живописи...думаю, нужно начинать приобщаться к великому. Старая пинакотека - идеальный вариант. Во-первых, стоит прийти в воскресенье, когда входной билет можно купить всего лишь (!) за 1 евро.  Но даже и в обычные дни...всего лишь 7 евро? Я посещала различные музеи  (в том числе и галереи живописи типа Прадо) в разных странах (Италия, Испания, Австрия и другие земли Германии) и могу сказать, что билеты в музеи Мюнхена очень дешевы. Что можно сказать о самом музее? Живопись великая, причем музей небольшой, неокрепшие пока еще в долгих походах по Луврам и Эрмитажам пугливые туристы не успеют особенно и испугаться как музей кончится...Пойдите и посмотрите на этого великого Дюрера в шубе. Очень много Рубенса. Поймала себя на мысли, что залы с Рубенсом очень похожи на эрмитажные....Внизу по стенам Рубенс, вверху  - огромные натюрморты (Снейдерс и иже с ним) с огромными лавками...дичь, рыба etc.

title: Per gli amanti dell’arte
text: Museo con opere d’arte straordinarie e uniche. Costo del biglietto base è di 7€ e l’audio guida è gratuita. Consiglio di andarci di mattina presto per visitare il museo con calma.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Zo veel beroemde kunstwerken...
text: Zalen vol Rubens, Van Dijck, Dürer, Rembrandt en veel andere oude meesters. Van renaissance tot Van Gogh en alles er tussenin. Het hangt er allemaal. Er zijn volgens mij maar weinig musea die deze collectie overtreffen.

title: Понравилось
text: Понравалось, пусть нет раскрученных полотен, но многое интересно и удивительно. Пока новая пикотека ремонтируется часть картин представлены в старой (Гойя, Констебль, Гейнсборо, Мане). В старой - Босх, ДаВинчи, Брейгель, Рубенс и много удивительных картин. По воскресеньям - вход 1 евро

title: Quand les rois deviennent des collectionneurs  pour notre plus grand plaisir
text: Lorsque l’on se rend pour quelques jours dans une ville étrangère, il faut faire des choix. Celui de la alte pinacothèque est un must a ne « zapper » sous aucun prétexte.Fra angelico, Rembrandt. Rubens, Dürher, Van Dick et biens d’autres nous stupéfient par leur technique, leur sensibilité, la beauté de leurs ouevres.Un conseil, la Alte pinacothèque se déguste, alors préparez votre visite cela vous permettra d’allez à l’essentiel.

title: EXCELENTE EDIFICIO Y COLECCION DE PIN TURA
text: Merece la pena la visita,aunque cueste 7euros,pero es un atractivo de Munich que no se debe dejar de ver,además,ya en el exterior,el conjunto de edificios es impresionante

title: Good Collection but not as large as others
text: There is a nice collection of artwork in the Alte Pinakothek but it pales in comparison to the Louvre, Rijksmuseum and the other famous European galleries.

title: Wat een grote collectie
text: Van vroeg middeleeuwen tot begin 20e eeuw opschilderen. Schilders die bijna nergens meer te vonden zijn ( Mathias de Mahler bv) zijn hier nog vertegenwoordigd,
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: デューラーは現地で見るのが一番
text: まず、大きな荷物はコインロッカーに預けなければいけないのでコインは用意しておくのがベター（両替もしてもらえますが、両替機はなかったです）。ここの目玉はドイツ人画家・デューラーの作品。実際にドイツで「4人の使徒」を見ると、体格も髪やひげの描写もなんとリアルなものだったのかと分かります。日本や他国を巡っていた頃には、デューラーの描く人間は少し大きすぎると感じていました。美術館の監視員さんが親切で、有名な自画像だけでなくその他のデューラーの作品も案内してくれました。また、ルーベンスの間は必見！巨大な最後の審判を中心に、大胆かつ緻密な絵画に囲まれる貴重な体験ができます。奥にはブーシェやフラゴナールの有名作品もあるので、ロココ美術がお好きな方にもお勧めできます。ノイエピナコテークもいくつもりが、ガイドブックに載っている休館日でも祝祭日でもないのになぜか休館でした。でも、アルテだけでお腹いっぱい、時間もいっぱいに使えました。鑑賞後はミュージアムカフェのハーブティで旅疲れも癒されました。

title: Alte Pinakothek
text: Celkom príjemne strávená hodinka popoludní, aj keď galéria zaberá iba jedno poschodie. Určite odporúčam využiť nedeľný vstup za 1€.I spent there a pleasant hour, even though the gallery occupies only one floor. I definitely recommend €1 entry on Sundays. Ich verbrachte dort ein angenehmes Stündchen, obwohl die Gallerie nur eine Etage umfasst. Auf jeden Fall empfehle ich den Sonntagseintritt für 1€.Pasé aquí una hora agradable, aunque la galería ocupa solo una planta. Definitivamente recomiendo la entrada de 1€ los domingos.

title: Fantástico museo de arte.
text: La Pinacoteca Antigua, es un fantástico museo de arte que merece ser visitado. Abarca desde la época Medieval hasta el siglo XIX.Tiene maravillosos cuadros de pintores famosos como Rubens, Murillo, Rembrandt, El Greco, Leonardo...entre otros. El museo también tiene exposiciones temporales.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Staré obrazy mistrů
text: Tato galerie je moc pěkná, velká sbírka obrazů známých malířů. Vstupné velmi přijatelné, stojí za to se tam podívat.

title: Wonderful Collection.
text: This museum is a must!  So many paintings by old masters in one place.  Plan to spend at least a day here!

title: Great art but difficult to enjoy
text: Lighting from the windows and ceiling window makes many pieces difficult to see, you have to move around at different angles to see! Best off coming here on a dark day!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A good spot to spend a few hours
text: The old gallery holds a treasure trove of paintings. it is worth a visit to view the old masters. well set out.

title: Per gli amanti dell'arte
text: Mostra di quadri il cui percorso è più facile con l'utilizzo di una cartina da prendere all'ingresso. Consigliata l'audioguida inclusa nel prezzo del biglietto.

title: Great art museum - MUST VISIT
text: This is the premier art museum in Munich and rivals anything in Europe.  We were very impressed by the art with artist like Bosch, de Vinci, Ruebens, Titian, El Greko, Albrect Durer, Murillo, Zurbaran, Velazquez, Brueghel and Botticelli.  One of its best pieces is the impressive Battle of Issus that my wife and I enjoyed.  The museum for me the size was not overwelming and can be seeing fairly quickly.  It has a great audio guide as well that tells you about the paintings and their significance.  Additionally the architecture of the building was impressive, especially the way it flowed and the exterior is combined with several great sculptures.  It is a MUST VISIT art museum.

title: Очень интересно
text: Пошли туда в воскресенье, вход в этот день всего 1евро. Имеется гардероб, кафе, магазин сувениров. Картины впечатляющие, большое разнообразие, очень хорошее освещение и большие залы, так что удобно рассмотреть все картины. Особенно впечатлили картины, достигавшие несколько метров в высоту. Завораживающее зрелище. Советую посетить!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: ゆったり鑑賞
text: ノイエピコナテークとセットで見学したいところでしたが、あいにくノイエピコナテークは修復中だったのでアルテだけを観光。広々としてゆったりした時間で見学でします。別に入場料はかかりますが期間限定でカラヴァッジョ展も行われていたのでそちらも興味があればいい機会なので見てみるのもいいかと思います。

title: Well Worth a Visit
text: Excellent collection of old masters including a Leonardo da Vinci.  Well worth the entry fee. Be careful to put the wrist ban on as guards will check. Good cafe with some nice selection of cakes.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Unbelievable collection
text: Amazing collection! I could have spent days in this museum with the great collection they have. They also have an amazing Caravaggio temporary exhibitions up - if you are there anytime soon, make sure to go! Really incredible.

title: Great selection of art, nice and clean place.
text: This has a wide variety of art, especially religious art and art from before the 1800s. It is a great place for people who are fans of art of that kind. It also has a café with delicious pastries and coffee. It is very clean and well maintained. Would highly reccommend.

title: Großartig
text: Wir waren mit einer Schülergruppe in der Alten Pinakothek. Junge Leute haben für alte Kunst nicht viel am Hut, außer sie wird interessant präsentiert, was bei unserem Besuch der Fall war. Spannende Geschichten und Erläuterungen über ausgesuchte Exponate fesselten uns alle.

title: ne Menge alter Schinken
text: In der alten Pinakothek gibt es ne Menge alter Schinken aber auch Werke von Weltruhm die alle etwas besonders sind.. Wer ihn noch nicht kennt sollte den Rubenssaal besuchen. Mein Tipp ist den 1 Euro Sonntag zu nutzen

title: Visita consigliata
text: Il museo è grande, interessante, architettonicamente molto bello e in un ottima posizione. Purtroppo durante il nostro soggiorno le sale inferiori erano chiuse, ma comunque il prezzo del biglietto se si va di domenica e di un solo euro. consiglio la visita per la presenza di alcune opere interessanti, su tutti Bosch, Raffaello, Dürer e tantissimi dipinti di Rubens. Anche le esposizioni temporanee posso essere molto interessanti, nel giorno in cui scrivo è presente quella dedicata a Caravaggio.

title: Caravaggio-Ausstellung eindrucksvoll aber...
text: Die Ausstellung selbst hat uns sehr gefallen, das Verhalten des Personals war meistens freundlich, aber leider nicht immer: Wieso darf man keine Leihschemel benutzen, was soll das Theater wegen einer kleinen Umhängetasche? Je nach Aufseher gibt es Probleme oder man wird freundlich begrüßt! Gibt es hier klare Regeln, oder kann sich jeder aufmanteln wie er will? Die Ausschilderung war ebenfalls nicht deutlich, insgesamt war die Freude an den Bildern durch die zu große Anzahl der Besucher doch erheblich gemindert.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: SUPERBE
text: Très beau musée .Bon accueil .Prix intéressant en combinant expo temporaire et permanente ( 1 euro de plus)SUPERBE exposition Caravage en Europe.

title: Sundays 1 Euro to enter! Fine Arts Museum that is awesome.
text: Signage is in both German and English at  the many points of admiration. ( Hosts, while crisply professional were helpful in locating toilet facilities. Cafe was much appreciated in the extreme heat when we visited.)  The collections are fantastic!

title: Вышли одухотворененные
text: Остались очень довольны посещением. Неспешный осмотр картин с чтением деталей о них - стратегия погружения в предметную область. Аудиогида на русском нет, мы заменили его на чтение информации в интернете: очень удобный метод.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Tijdelijke tentoonstelling Carravagisten
text: De tijdelijke tentoonstelling over de Caravagisten uit Utrecht is adembenemend.  Neem zeker ook de audiogids, behalve de extra uitleg krijg je ook muziekfragmenten die speciaal bij elk schilderij zijn uitgezocht.  De tentoonstelling gaat vooral over schilders die zich lieten inspireren door Caravaggio, maar er zijn ook enkel originele werken van de schilder zelf te zien.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Hvis man er interesseret i ældre kunst, så er dette museum et besøg værd.
text: Flot museum med ældre kunst, før år 1800. Helt sikkert et besøg værd. Museet er centralt beliggende i Munchen.

title: Разочарование.
text: Коллекция Старой Пинакотеки особо ничем не примечательна и самые интересные и знаковые картины собраны в Новой. Которая закрыта... по информации на сайте перенесена на перый этаж Старой, но в данный момент недоступна...Также невзрачная выставка Караваджо и Ко.. похоже на попытку заработать, использую имя Мастера. Картины последователей несравнимо слабее и их ценность явно притянута для привлечения посетителей... Очень жаль. Посещение Пинакотек несколько лет назад оставило гораздо больше приятных впечатлений.

title: Wildly exceeded my expectations
text: We went because I wanted to see Albrecht Durer’s famous self-portrait. We did not know the museum was also the home of so many other artists, including Titian, Fra Angelico, Raphael, Rembrandt, Rubens, to name only a few. For a family that loves art, but are not experts by any means, this museum was a highlight of our trip.

title: Disappointed
text: Not the most interesting gallery - everything seemed very dark and somber. Great if you like religious art.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Croutes à l’accueil
text: Très belle collection mais personnel à l’accueil exécrable. A peine arrivé, un membre du personnel facilement reconnaissable à sa tonsure semble dépourvu de toute politesse. Il nous demande ce que l’on veut -alors même qu’il se trouve au guichet- et nous aboie les tarifs en tendant la main. Scandaleux.

title: Excellent
text: Perfect size for an hour or two. Some wonderful collections. Museums are only 1 Euro on Sundays! You can't pass that up.

title: Wonderful display up a huge flight of stairs!
text: You really need to know where you’re going and be ready to climb an epic flight of stairs, and then open a huge “fire door “ sized door to get in to see this great display.  Once there, however, it’s a cavalcade of Picasso and Rembrandt!

title: Caravaggio-Ausstellung und Dauerausstellung sehenswert
text: Die Caravaggio-Ausstellung war sehr informativ. Aber auch die Dauerausstellung bietet tolle Bilder. Die Scones im Museumscafe waren sehr lecker
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: たくさんの絵画
text: ミュンヘンで　天気悪い時の観光などにオススメできます。とても重厚な絵画を楽しめます。混雑していないので　ゆっくり訪問できます。

title: Capolavori
text: Come Pinacoteca una delle migliori al mondo, considerato che sono rappresentate le migliori scuole di pittura. Rubens su tutti. La domenica costa 1€ (almeno quando siamo andati noi).
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: de tentoonstelling Utrecht Caravaggio meer dan de moeite waard
text: Als bij toeval kwam ik voorbij de Alte Pinakotheken en zag een tentoonstelling over mijn lievelingsschilder Caravaggio en drie van zijn volgelingen, Utrechtse schilders die zijn werk bestudeerden in Rome in zijn tijd. Heel tof opgestelde tentoonstelling. Per onderwerp. Gemakkelijk om vergelijkingen te maken. Er hadden wat meer originele Caravaggio's mogen zijn maar het was echt wel de moeite waard.

title: Para amantes de maestros del renacimiento
text: Amplia y muy disfrutable, se pueden sacar fotos de los imponentes cuadros. El autoretrato de Durero y Madame de Pompadur, entre lo mas destacado. Una pena que el ala dedicada a los artistas italianos estaba cerrada. Dentro de la pinacoteca hay un cafe. Se pueden conseguir entradas conjuntas con la pinacoteca moderna y otras opciones interesantes.

title: Наилучшие старые немецкие мастера
text: Конечно, Старая Пинакотека это "the must" в Мюнхене, но... Об'ять необ'ятное невозможно, голова разболится и все смешается. Предлагаю опустить гектары Рубенса, но абсолютно обязательно посмотреть Дюрера - совершенно потрясающий автопортрет в виде Спасителя, ну и другие "старые" немцы. Такого нет нигде. Небольшие полотна Рембранта со "светом Рембранта" тоже стоит найти и восхититься.

title: Carrvaggisten
text: Die Ausstellung zu den Cravaggisten hat mich nach München geführt. Sie ist überaus lohnend. Sie zeigt, wie der künstlerisch revolutionäre Caravaggio andere Künstler angesteckt hat. Rom war damals wegweisend. Zu einzelnn Bildern der Ausstellung gibt es Kompositionen von Musikstudenten, sehr gelungen. Die Musik erschließt ganz neu die Bilder und ihre Geschichte. Es lohnt sich der Audio-Guide, insgesamt sind das 90 Minuten Musik.

title: Touristenfalle für Bildungsbürger
text: Kein einziges Originalbild zu sehen, es ist keine Ausstellung, die „Caravaggio“ im Titel verdient, sondern vielleicht „Utrechter Malerei im 17. Jahrhundert“ heißen sollte. Und das Ticket gilt nicht einmal für die übrige Pinakothek. Ich habe mich noch nie so vergackeiert gefühlt.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great museum with outstanding collections
text: We have visited many art museums in various cities but this is an outstanding one to visit in Munich if you like an excellent and diverse collection.  Like all museums, it is easy to get disoriented in the various rooms so our family group split up and arranged a meeting place.

title: Sonderausstellung Caravaggio - ärgerlicher Zwischenfall
text: Die Ausstellung ist toll und sehr zu empfehlen. Ich hatte allerdings ein Erlebnis, das mir den Kunstgenuss am Ende verdorben hat: Ich hatte eine Papiertasche in DINA 4-Größe dabei und wurde damit durch den Einlass und durch alle Räume gelassen. In der Ausstellung wimmelte es von Aufsehern. Im letzten (!) Raum, meinte eine Aufseherin, ich dürfte mit dieser Tasche nicht weitergehen, sie sei zu lang (!). Ich müsse nochmal zurück zur Garderobe und die Tasche abgeben. Zumal es sich um den letzten Ausstellungsraum handelte, brach ich dann hier den Ausstellungsbesuch ab und habe mich sehr geärgert. Schade, denn die Ausstellung der flämischen und italienischen Künstler ist sehr sehenswert und gut zusammengestellt.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Znakomita i jeszcze lepsza
text: Kolekcja w pięknym budynku dobrze zaprezentowana. Kolekcja rozpoczyna się od średniowiecza aż po rokoko. Nadmiar piękna w jednym miejscu. Najlepsze europejskie malarstwo: Bosch, Tycjan, Botticelli, Dürer,  El Greco, da Vinci, Rubens, Velázquez i wielu innych...

title: Para los amantes del arte.
text: Si eres amante del arte te gustará. Tienen obras de diferentes artistas y la gran mayoría son religiosas. Para mi gusto debería tener una sala con otra temática, pero ello no quita que es un lugar sorprendente con gran valor.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lindo Museu
text: Obras maravilhosas a serem apreciadas.Vale a pena a visita para quem curte Museu.É um dos mais importantes Museus da Alemanha.Tem obras de Botticelli, Tintoretto, Rafael Sanzio, dentre outras tantas.

title: Богатейшая коллекция
text: Мне очень повезло! Одновременно с основной экспозицией проходила выставка картин учеников школы Караваджо! Так что первые 1,5 часа я наслаждалась сравнением работ итальянских, французских и голландских последователей знаменитого мастера! Отдельно хочу отметить аудиогиды! Интересная и достаточно исчерпывающая информация по экспонатам, а так же возможность прослушать дополнительно по желанию!А следующие 2 часа я наслаждалась собственной огромной коллекцией музея! Разные эпохи, разные стили.... ощущение что ты находишься в петле времени! Забываешь что вокруг современный мир, суета....

title: Von der Malerei geprägt
text: Die Dauerausstellung im sehr informativen Kunstmuseum wird von der Malerei geprägt. Selber bewunderten wir vor allem die Bilder des wohl bekanntesten flämisch stämmigen Barockmalers Peter Paul Rubens. Aber auch darüber hinaus hatten wir unsere „absolute Freude“ wegen der abwechslungsreichen Vielseitigkeit. Zumindest auf dem Kunstsektor eines der Highlights unseres Besuchs in München.

title: Beautiful Museum!
text: Went here on a rainy day. Spent about 3 hours in the museum.  Beautiful works of art and history. Inside museum beautiful. Not too crowded and easy to maneuver around.

title: Fantastic Art
text: In my humble opinion, if there's one art museum that's a must in Munich, it's Alte Pinakothek. There's some truly fabulous Renaissance, Dutch Masters and Baroque art et al. I'd love to say that my favourite painting is one of the many Rubens in the museum, but sadly I'd have to go for the rather atypical interpretation of Battle of Issus by Albrecht Altdorfer for it's allegory to the wars between Austrians and Ottomans and for my love of classical history.I came here on a Sunday when the entrance tickets are discounted to €1!

title: 뮌헨 최고의 미술관
text: 알테 노이어 모데르니 미술관 중 명성만으로는 가장 유명한 곳입니다. 그림 감상하기에 좋습니다. 세계 5대 회화관에 속한다고 하니 꼭 하루를 내어 관람하길 추천합니다.

title: Classic Art
text: A beautiful museum filled with exceptional art. 14th to 18th century: Be mesmerized Dürer’s self portrait and the works by the other great masters, Raphael, da Vinci , Titian, El Greco, Rubens, Rembrandt. Currently there is an excellent exhibition on paintings and painters in and of the style representing the subject matter and their influence by the great Italian painter Caravaggio. This alone would be well worth a visit to the museum.  One more reason to come, Peter Paul Rubens. Dozens upon dozens of paintings from sketch size to oversized you will be wowed. There are only 24 hours in a day and lots of wonderful classic art to see, plan accordingly.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Early German Galleries closed for 3019
text: We were disappointed in finding the first floor galleries closed for 2019.  So no German primitives, or other early German works.  We came especially for these.  The rest of the permanent collection was as wonderful as you would expect.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Superb Art
text: What a great place - you can see the greatest of artists all under one roof ....and for 1 Euro on a Sunday! Use the lockers - free of charge - to leave all your bags etc. securely before you start your visit and allow a few hours - you'll never have long enough!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Catch the Special Exhibit
text: We went to this museum, paid the regular admission and got our included audio box. Seeing the permanent exhibit was very good, with a scattering of paintings having associated audio discussions. However,   ....we then went into the special exhibit on Cavecchia (sp?) etc al and were absolutely amazed at the quality of this temporary collection. Wonderfully arranged by topics with other painters of the same period,  resulting in an experience that is hard to surpass. Stunning.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: SORPRENDENTE ...
text: La pinacoteca merece una visita. Pinturas de MURILLO, REMBRANT,EL AUTO RETRATO DE DURERO, un DA VINCI BOTTICELLI, RAFAEL, TIZIANO.....sorprende por lo bien presentada.... tiempo para disfrutarla ... al menos 4 horas ... los domingos cuesta un euro y existen tarifas reducidas para estudiantes y mayores de 65 años.

title: Terrible management/administration!
text: Prepare yourself not to get frustrated by the incredibly inefficient way the museum is run (stereotypes about German efficiency... perhaps those on its suffocating bureaucracy are more accurate!), and budget at least 1 more hour than you had originally for your visit to get your ticket... yes, you read correctly, for something just as simple as getting your entrance ticket, even just for the permanent collection, not only for the special exhibition which, sure, do attract crowds. So be prepared to long lines/queues occupying most of the large museum lobby and continuing outside (sometimes in the rain or snow). Now, besides this being inefficient, it is also rather rude to your visitors to keep them at the mercy of weather because you can't properly manage your ticket sales!This is due to the fact that:1. There does not to seem to be any possibility to get your ticket online, something which would come with a special code that could be scanned at the entrance, or similar solution (hellooo? we are in 2019? and is Munich supposed to be the tech hub of Germany???);2. There are only 2 or 3 people physically issuing tickets or the wristband they use as such;3. When you pay for the special exhibition no one (yes, NO one) even bothers to ask you whether you are also interested in seeing the permanent collection and tells you that you have to pay separately for that, even if it is just 1 euro! As a consequence people may have to go back to that extremely slow ticket counter, just to increase its queue... ridiculous.There was a sign at the door of the museum that they may be slowing the flow of visitors, because of the limited space, yet there was no sign or evidence that anyone was controlling the number of people leaving and coming in. In fact, the museum rooms were packed anyways, and especially with groups mixed with individuals. Why don't you have days for groups (or half days) and individuals separately??Just a textbook case of incredibly poor management!

title: Great Art Museum
text: In May 2019 we visited the Alte Pinakothek, an art museum located in the Kunstareal area in Munich.  It is reported to be one of the oldest galleries in the world and houses a significant collection of Old Master paintings.  The name Alte (Old) Pinakothek refers to the time period covered by the collection – from the 14th to the 18th century.  The Neue Pinakothek, currently closed for significant renovations, covers 19th century art, and Pinakothek der Moderne, opened in 2002, exhibits modern art.  All three galleries are part of the Bavarian State Painting Collections.  Prior to visiting the permanent collection, my friend and I visited the special exhibit – Utrecht, Caravaggio, and Europe.  While we liked the collection of painting in this special exhibit, we were less than pleased with the management of visitors and the flow of people.  During the time we visited there were far too many people in this special exhibit.  Once out of the special exhibit area, we felt we were in a well-managed art museum.  This museum is a "must see" when in Munich.

title: un tuffo nell'arte
text: Matteo Cataldo, 18anni, Liceo Linguistico Rita Levi-Montalcini, Casarano (LE)Ho visitato l’“Alte Pinakothek” di Monaco nel marzo 2019, insieme alla mia classe nel corso di un’esperienza di alternanza scuola-lavoro durata cinque giorni. Si tratta di una delle costruzioni museali più grandi al mondo, superata solo con la costruzione del museo del Louvre. La collezione parte dal tardo Medioevo, fino ad arrivare a circa la metà del 18° secolo. Ne fanno opere dei più grandi artisti delle correnti che si sono avvicendate in quest’arco di tempo, tra cui molti italiani, a cui è dedicata un’intera sala del museo. Si possono incontrare pittori come Leonardo da Vinci, Botticelli, Raffaello, Beato Angelico e molti altri. L’artista più importante della collezione è forse Peter Paul Rubens, cui sono dedicate molte stanze. Proprio qui si trova il “Grande giudizio universale”, un’opera dalle dimensioni colossali (605×460 cm), spesso comparata al più noto “Giudizio universale” di Michelangelo. Il museo, sviluppandosi su due piani ed ospitando una collezione così tanto vasta, richiede almeno due ore per una visita approfondita. Personalmente, in poco più di un’ora, sono purtroppo riuscito ad ammirare solo gran parte del primo piano, dove si trovavano le opere da analizzare per la nostra esperienza di alternanza. Consiglio fortemente di visitare il museo, poiché è di certo tra i migliori al mondo. Inoltre, i prezzi sono, come nella maggior parte dei musei monacensi, per niente elevati e gli studenti anche provenienti dall’estero hanno la possibilità di entrare in maniera completamente gratuita.

title: もう一度行ってみたい
text: 入館料：ノイエピコナテークとの共通券で12EUR。14年ぶり再訪。2018年8月、館内改装中で展示物が少なくなっていますが、それでもゆっくり見ると時間が掛かります。ルーベンスの作品の多さは特筆。このとき残念ながらブリューゲルの作品を見つけることができませんでしたが、フェルメールの「手紙を読む青衣の女」が展示されていたのがラッキーでした。今回、美術館の改装を知らなかったので、観たかった絵画の幾つかを見逃してしまいました。また、機会を見つけていったみたい美術館の１つです。

title: Many Rubens and one Leonardo
text: The reach collection of old masters is unavoidable for anyone who  like or are interested in this kind of art. I was there on Sunday when entrance fee is only 1€.  The most impressive for me were many lavish Rubens' paintings. And my favourite Leonardo that is unpretentiously exhibited.

title: Beau musée
text: Alte Pinakothek propose aux visiteurs de belles collections de peinture dont beaucoup depuis la Renaissance. Il y a quelques oeuvres venant de la Neue Pinakothek, actuellement fermée.

title: Imperdível!
text: Este é um dos três museus que compõem a Pinacoteca de Munique. Optamos por visitar apenas este por contingências de tempo e ficamos muito satisfeitos. A maioria dos turistas acaba não visitando esta parte e acabam perdendo uma magnífica atração. Acervo de arte medieval até o século XVIII, sendo um dos melhores que conheci na Europa até agora. Recomendo a visita para quem se interessa por arte.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Not to be missed
text: If you enjoy strolling through art museums, you will not want to miss this one.  We actually were fortunate enough to visit the museum and experience their special exhibition on Caravaggio.  What a bonus.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great museum yet Terrible staff
text: Went there on a Sunday and there were crowds queuing up for the tickets inside the museum; when it was our turn to approach the staff member and buy the tickets, the staff rudely asked us to pay 1 euro under the condition that we were indeed asking about the difference in ticket types (they have the regular exhibition plus the new exhibition). When we tried to ask again to receive the right piece of information, the staff simply broke in before we ended our question: 1 Euro, I'm sorry but I don't have time. Obviously he is extremely impatient by the queue and he couldn't perform what he was supposed to do. I can't really believe that there would still be people acting in such manner to customers in these days...This dreadful experience has diminished my chance of visiting here again - despite the museum offers a wide variety of exhibits.

title: Capolavori dell’arte
text: Uno tra i più prestigiosi musei d’Europa. Vi si trovano anche le opere di grandi pittori italiani, da Giotto a Canaletto.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: The Masters
text: If you are looking for art from the old painters, this is the place.  Well worth the effort for art enthusiasts.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Gemäldegalerie von Weltrang
text: Wer die alten Meister der Malerei liebt, ist hier besonders richtig. Besonders die Sammlung von Rubens-Bildern ist weltweit unübertroffen.

title: Acervo Maravilhoso
text: O acervo da Pinacoteca dos Mestres Antigos (Gemäldegalerie Alter Meister), em Dresden, é maravilhoso! Dentre as obras mais conhecidas está o quadro de Rafael Sanzio (1483-1520) - Madonna Sixtina , 1513-14. Óleo sobre linho com tamanho de 265 cm x 196 cm.Merece ser visitado!

title: the best Germany has to offer!
text: the collection of Durers are terrific.nothing to dislike about this collection. Much early works from the 1500sthe size is perfect. a few hours and youve had plenty.

title: Some of the Best art in Germany
text: This museum has a relatively small but significant collection. The works of Peter Paul Reubens are something to behold. The have Rembrandts, Bosch, Botticelli and others. The listening device is a must. Many works have limited descriptions.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great collection
text: Big museum, great collection. Not very crowded and you can easily see the whole collection in about 2-3 hours. On Sundays the entrance ticket is only 1 euro.

title: Schatzhaus der Kunst - Sonderausstellung Caravaggisten!
text: das Museum ist eine Schatzkammer, ein Rausch der Farben und Formen, eine Freude & Augenweide! Highlight jedes München-Besuchs! Derzeit (Frühjahr 2019) ist die Schau der Caravaggisten eine Reise wert! In unsrer Pfarrkirche in Umkirch bei Freiburg hängt eine Kopie des Himmelfahrt-Gemäldes von Guido Reni; schön, hier das Original zu sehen!

title: ダビンチ作品あります
text: 個人的な興味から言えば、ダビンチとレンブラントが良かったです。美術品の配列も見やすかったです。また、企画展でカラヴァッジョ展も開催していたため、鑑賞でき、良かったです。

title: かなり偏ったコレクション
text: 昔の王家のコレクションがベースになってるのだが、彼らの趣味が色濃く反映され、14-17世紀のドイツ、オランダあたりの作品が集中している。特に、ルーベンスの作品数はかなりのもの。印象派などは、別の「ノイエピナコテーク」にある（ただし、2019年4月時点で、改装のため閉館中）。これらの時代、地域の絵画に興味があるなら、必見の美術館。

title: Απαραίτητη η επισκεψη
text: Μια πινακοθήκη στην οποία μπορεί κάποιος να απολαύσει έργα της γερμανικής, ολλανδικής, ιταλικής και φιλανδικης ζωγραφικής. Αρχισε να λειτουργεί το 1836 και ήταν τότε το μεγαλύτερο μουσείο στον κόσμο. Είναι εντυπωσιακή η εκμετάλλευση του φυσικού φωτός, ενώ ο χώρος και η διάταξη των έργων είναι πολύ ορθά δομημένη.Την Κυριακή το εισιτήριο κοστίζει 1€ και ενώ έχει αρκετή ουρά, προχωράει γρήγορα χωρίς καθυστερήσεις

title: A great collection
text: A wonderful collection of european painting. Big, but not overwhelming. Easy to navigate, not crowded and with plenty of seats to rest your weary feet. My only two complaints: Second class paintings are often hung on a second tier, much too high to really see them, so why not put them in the store room? Also, direct lighting often causes disturbing reflections.

title: Sehr sehenswert!
text: Die alte Pinakothek von München gehört in eine Reihe mit dem Prado Museum in Madrid oder der Erimitage in St. Patersburg. Die alten Meister sind sehr sehenswert.

title: 美術を好きにさせてくれた原点
text: ３２年前にこの美術館で絵画のすばらしさに魅せられ、ポストカードを買って帰ったことがその後の美術館巡りのきっかけとなりました。その時にどの絵を見たのか記憶は全くありませんでしたが、素晴らしい作品ばかりでフレッシュな気持ちで館内を回りました。１階を中心とした宗教画は吸い込まれるような美しさがありました。また世界各地の生き物を描いた絵画が数枚シリーズであり、無名のものだと思いますが、当時の世界観が生き物で表現されていてとても面白かったです。またルーベンスのコレクションは素晴らしく、しばらく椅子に座ってぼーっと見とれてしまいました。オーディオガイドの貸し出しはわずか７ユーロの入場料に含まれており、お得です。

title: Great art, terrible experiences with staff
text: Before heading to this museum, I read reviews on here that seemed to generally agree that the art was fantastic but many of which also reported unpleasant experiences with the staff. I agree on both counts.My experience began as soon as I walked in the door, where it wasn't clearly marked where to go to buy tickets, leaving me to hope I'd figured out the correct spot on my own, and also not clearly marked as to where to wait to be served, so I stood behind the seeming ticket counters waiting for one to open up. A couple then proceeded to cut in front of me in line, and the ticketing staff either did not notice or did not care and took them ahead of me. 'Okay, maybe they really didn't notice,' I thought. Then when I purchased a ticket the employee asked if I wanted only the permanent exhibitions, only the special exhibition, or both. I said both at least two or three times, as she kept repeating the questions somehow seeming to not realize I was answering her. At the time I thought it was weird that both only cost the price of regular admission, as why would she ask me otherwise? (Stay tuned for later.) Then I went over to the audio guide desk, where an employee was eating something and did not say anything to me, so I assumed he was on break and waited for someone else to help me. Then, once again, other people walked up and walked around me (though this time I was literally standing at the counter) and asked for guides, and he put down his food and helped them. Only after that did he help me. I then spent some time in the upstairs permanent galleries, and after some time passed a security guard approached me. At first I thought he was just being conversational, as I've sometimes had that with staff in other museums, but it became increasingly clear that he was trying to pick me up, not just chat. He asked if he could write me on Facebook, and I said I didn't have Facebook (which is true but I certainly wouldn't blame someone for politely lying), and then he kept asking me for my phone number! He literally wouldn't take no for an answer, and I finally fled from the room to the other end of the floor. The experience was so upsetting that every time I saw a guard coming in the distance that looked like it might be him, I left whatever room I was in, until I gave up after maybe half an hour and left the floor entirely. I cannot believe how inappropriate his behavior was. So then I went to the special exhibition, and that's how I found out that I had been sold the wrong ticket. So, I had to go back to the ticket counter and buy the correct ticket, and the employee who'd made the mistake sold me the correct ticket and not only didn't apologize, but was rather rude to me on the second try. As to the art: It's fantastic, focused on medieval to 18th c., and while it of course has a lot of German art, it also has extensive collections of Flemish/Dutch, Italian, and French art, as well as some from other locations. I personally particularly appreciated their large collections of Rubens' and Dürer's works, and their collection of 18th c. French pastels, as someone who is a big fan of both Rubens and pastel portraiture, and who had previously mostly seen Dürer's prints in person rather than his paintings. Dürer's probable self-portrait, considered to be the first 'Western' self-portrait, is probably the museum's most famous holding, and if you google Dürer, images of it will be amongst the top hits. I took the permanent exhibition audio guide (which is complimentary) and I did find it interesting for the pieces it includes; unlike many other museums in Germany, all the labels are in English as well as German, and almost all of them include more information than just the artist and date,  but the audio guide provides additional information beyond what the labels say. For the paintings I viewed, the labels and the audio guide are mostly interested in discussing them in terms of the way they are works of art - things like the composition choices made and the artists that influenced the painter - rather than what they say about society, and especially not about topics like the everyday impacts on Europe of colonialism and the slave trade, things which are clearly visible in many European artworks if you begin to get a sense of what sorts of things to look for. Of everything I viewed, only one painting even mentioned colonialism, and that was a painting where the only person pictured was "a Moor servant," so they kind of had to do so. Due to the harassment of the guard, I unfortunately wasn't able to see all I'd planned to see on the upper floor. The special exhibition running now is "Utrecht, Caravaggio, and Europe," focused on how three painters from Utrecht (in what's now the Netherlands) went to Rome and were greatly influenced by their contemporary Caravaggio's innovative painting style. It includes a few paintings by Caravaggio. It was highly recommended to me by one of the staff at my hotel, and I enjoyed it, although a large group tour going through the small galleries at the same time was fairly disruptive. I also bought the audio guide for this tour, which is €4 extra (and I'm still perplexed as to why the person selling them didn't mention I'd unknowingly bought the wrong ticket as my wristband clearly showed I had, but that's another story), and I found that very helpful. Instead of full wall labels, the museum has created booklets in German, English, and Dutch, but many of the galleries are poorly lit and it can be difficult to read the booklet.
