The audio guide provides most of the same information as the booklet, and I think some additional information as well. So in the end, I can't tell you whether to visit this museum or not. The art was fantastic, but my experiences with the staff were overall awful. If I were rating it on the art alone I'd give it four or five stars, but when an employee's behavior could potentially impede you from actually seeing all the art in the museum, is it worth it? I honestly don't know.

title: ATRACTIVA COLECCIÓN DE PINTURA.
text: No perderos una visita a esta pinacoteca, obras excelentes...visitar a 1€ los domingos. Es genial.Muy bien organizado el itinerario por pintores y sus obras.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Niente da invidiare a musei più blasonati
text: Davvero una bellissima raccolta di opere, tantissime opere di Rubens, grande spazio agli autori italiani, stupendi Raffaello e anche un Leonardo da Vinci e Giotto. La domenica ingresso a  1 euro!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: tolle neue Sonderausstellung "Utrecht, Caravaggio und Europa"
text: Ganz frisch eröffnet ist die Sonderausstellung "Utrecht, Caravaggio und Europa" - nicht ganz günstig, aber sehenswert! Eine bemerkenswerte Sammlung klassischer Meisterwerke. Schauen Sie vorbei!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: You can easily spend a few hours there
text: It’s worthwhile visiting Alte Pinakothek just to see the world famous collections of paintings respectively by Albrecht Dürer and Peter Paul Rubens. There’re many great works by other old masters. The English audioguide, which was included in the entrance fee, provided me with some very useful explanations on selected works. The museum was supposed to close at 20:00 since I went there on a Tuesday. But I was told by the staff at the ticket office that due to some special event the closing time was 18:00. My visit was a bit rushed towards the end. If travel to Munich next time, I definitely will visit Alte Pinakothek again.

title: There is no Mona Lisa
text: Dear all,I went all the way to see a different Mona Lisa ( compared with Mona Lisa in Paris) since I saw trip advisor posted this photo.However there is no Mona Lisa here !

title: Fantástico
text: Museu espetacular com obras de arte do século 14 ao 18. Só o auto-retrato do Albrecht Duhrer - que teria sido pintado em 1500 - já vale a visita. Mas tem Bosch, Rubens, Rafael, Tintoretto, El Greco... Outro aspecto positivo é que os espaços são amplos e, apesar da riqueza do acervo, não há uma quantidade imensa de obras que torne a visita "cansativa". Dica: aos domingos a visita custa apenas 1 euro por pessoa.

title: Bemerkenswert und Beeindruckend
text: Wenigstens EINMAL muss man hier gewesen sein, denn diese Sammlung von Meisterwerken sollte man sich nicht entgehen lassen. Hinzu kommt, daß der Eintritt am Sonntag nur 1 Euro war! Ich werd am nächsten Wochenende wenn es regnet wieder reingehen !

title: World Class Northern European Renaissance Art
text: This museum is a must if you want to see a world class collection of Northern European Renaissance Paintings. For an enthusiast like myself it is a great experience and well worth a couple or three hours punctuated by an excellent café that has very good cakes and leaf tea. The audio guides are really helpful. For me the highlights were the Rogier van der Weyden Saint Columba Altarpiece and Hans Memling The Seven Joys of Mary. It also has an early Leonardo. If this is not your thing it may not be the best use of your time, however there is so much to see in Munich and it is close to the English garden and beer.

title: Beautiful Building...
text: Maybe I'm not a museum guy - but if I see another Jesus painting, well... make a conclusion of your own.Some impressive artwork here - but I found myself just drifting through this kinda as quick as I could.Note: there is some kind of multi-pass for museums in this area. They didn't tell us at the desk when we purchased our ticket - but at the next museum they asked us if we wanted the pass. Shame on these guys for not mentioning it.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 圧巻です
text: ルーブルなんかと比べると全く素っ気ない外観で、本当にここに本で見たような多数の作品が展示されているのかといぶかしみつつ入りましたが･･二階に上がって天井の高い広大な空間に果てしなく展示が続く景色に肝を潰しました、凄まじいほどの豪奢です。

title: 膨大なコレクション
text: ガイドブックでは事前に理解していたつもりですが、訪問すればその膨大なコレクションが整然と展示されていることに圧倒されました。展示会場は２階で階段を使うのが一般的なので手荷物は最低限が良いかと思います。ここも手荷物を預けることはできます。絵画の内容はガイドブックに譲るとして、個人的には倉敷の大原美術館のエルグレコの受胎告知との対比を楽しみに訪問しました。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Magnifico
text: Una delle collezioni più belle che abbia mai visto. E'stato emozionante trovarsi a tu per tu con opere famose viste solo nei libri di scuola.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: This was my third visit and it won't be my last.
text: Each time I come here I learn a bit more and enjoy the paintings more. I now know how to pace myself and to allow PLENTY of time with a couple of trips to the excellent cafe in between.

title: 東京の美術館と比較して、とても空いています
text: 静かに絵画を鑑賞できました。とても広いので、スニーカーで出向きましたが、それでも足が疲れてしまいました。広い美術館では、歩く量が多くなりますね。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Идеальное место культурно отдохнуть.
text: Был всего один день в Мюнхене. Выбрал старую пинакотеку. Ничего кроме картин там нет, так что не всем будет интересно, но для интересующихся европейской живописью и желающих расширить свой кругозор в этом направлении обязательное место к посещению. Минимализм в оформлении, тишина, мало людей и Дюреры, Рембрандты, Бальдунг Грины, Брейгели, Рубенсы и Босхи...Вход 7 евро.Туалеты чистые удобные.Арендные ячейки за 1 евро (возможность оставить даже большую сумку).Кафе есть с полноценным меню.Русского аудиогида нет.

title: Alte Pinakothek
text: Στη συνοικία των μουσείων φιλοξενεί  συλλογές από τους δούκες,τους εκλέκτορες και τους βασιλείς της Βαυβαρίας όως επίσης και θησαυρούς από μοναστήρια . Σπουδαία αρχιτεκτονική του κτιρίου και ανεκτίμητα αριστουργήματα από τον 14ο έως και τον 18ο αιώνα. Τις Κυριακές 1€ η είσοδος .

title: Worst staff ever
text: The staff was surrealy rude to me, asked for my passport as soon as I arrived and made mean comments about my county of origin (in german, thinking I wouldnt understand). This was the single worst experience I had ever had in a museum in my entire life!

title: Понравилось
text: На просмотр потратили часа 1.5, с учётом того, что был ремонт правого крыла на 1 этаже.Благодаря отзыву о гардеробе положили вещи в камеру хранения за 2€, которые выкатились автоматически при открытии шкафчика.Осталась довольна походом в данный музей. Советую

title: Великолепно
text: Представлены работы Рембранта,Рубенса,Тинторетто,Тициана,Брегеля,Дюрера.Великолепная работа Леонардо да Винчи.Прекрасная галерея.Обязательно к посещению.Для осмотра работ нужно минимум 6 часов.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beeindruckende Sammlung an alten Meisterwerken
text: Sehr übersichtlich geordnet, schöne Räumlichkeiten, lädt zum längeren Verweilen einund auch ein nettes Cafe rundet den Kunstgenuß ab.

title: Третьяковка в Мюнхене
text: Билеты 7 евро , 5 евро дети и +65 лет.Оплата можно картой.Есть раздевалка стоимость 1 евро на человека, даже если два пальто будут вешать на один номер.Есть камера хранения , залог 1 евро или 2 евро.Лучше сдать сумки все , удобно ходить и не придется сдавать потом , меня отправили с дамской сумочкой , при чем во втором крыле. На первом этаже более строгие оказались. Дают браслетики как в аквапарке. Очень люблю Рубенса , поэтому удовлетворилась , картин много  , есть что посмотреть. Ориентировочно 1,5- 2 часа на все .

title: Quite a collection
text: I didn’t have time to go through the entire place as I got there about 1.5 hr before closing. It is a nice set up and the audio guide was nice to have. The building is interesting to see too.

title: Unglaublich
text: beste Museum in München. Die Treppe ist einfach unbeschreiblich und die Sammlung von den flämischen Maler auch. Sonntag nur 1€

title: Famous paintings
text: A place where visitor can admire one of the richest European collection of art paintings.The Museum is really worth seeing.

title: Laberinto de arte
text: Me gustó mucho pasar una mañana en el museo, se me hizo corto pues tienen muchos pasillos y salas llenas y llenas  de pintura,  fui en domingo y pagué un euro , baratisimo por ver a Rubens lo que sea :D  , quedé maravillada .

title: Прекрасный музей. Я думаю это одна из лучших коллекций шедевров в мире.
text: Прекрасный музей. Я думаю это одна из лучших коллекций шедевров в мире.  На посещение этой пинакотеки и двух новых нужно отвести целый день.  Разумеется современное искусство  часто трудно воспринимается. В этом случае лучше ограничиться только старой пинакотекой.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Богатейшая коллекция картин.
text: Немецкий феодальный род Виттельсбахов оставил сегодня живущим - сокровищницу мировой культуры- Alte Pinakothek. Вход 7 евро. Планируйте 4-5 часов на посещение. Зал Leonardo  закрыт. Дюрер потрясающий, Есть 2 картины Яна Брейгеля (отца). Гирландайо, Рубенс, Тициан, Тинторетто!!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Место для ценителей
text: Если вас не прельщает перспектива потратить часа два, разглядываю картины старых европейских мастеров, то вам лучше потрать время на что нибудь другое. Это место предназначается именно для неторопливой прогулки по оргомным залам с картинами по 20 метров и расглядыванию деталей и фирменных признаков старой голандской школы. Интересный факт: каждое воскресение вход всего 1 евро. Еще один не менее интересный факт: сдать одежду в гардероб тоже стоит один евро, который невозвращается. Сдать рюкзак в камеру хранения стоит один евро, но хоть он возвращается.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Pleasant Museum of Great Masters
text: A wonderful museum for art lovers!! Easily done in an afternoon without wearing oneself out and you get to see all the great masters from the 14th through the 18thc. Well laid out in different periods of art history and the works on display were gorgeous. A good representation for everyone with works from Albrecht Durer, Rembrandt, to August Macke. A must for art lovers if you are in Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Big collection of religious based paintings
text: A building worthwhile to visit  whith an excellent presentation of the artwork of Flemmish, Italian, German painters of medievial and rennaisanse period. The majority of the paintigs are religious based, a theme that doesnt appeal to me, since it is very common.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excelso arte alemán y flamenco
text: Artistas como Da Vinci, Rubens, Durero, El Bosco, etc. De fácil recorrida con audioguías en varios idiomas.

title: Always worth a visit
text: We've probably been here 4 times over the years. The collection of 13th to 18th century European paintings is fantastic! Free audioguides are available in multiple languages.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Alltagdokus vor 500 Jahre
text: Die Gemeldekollektion von vergangenen Jahrhunderten ist sehr geprägt von religiöse Motive. Aber es gibt auch einige, die gewöhnliche Leute von 15. und 16. Jahrhundert zeigen. Also richtige bis 500 Jahre alte Zeitzeuge-dokumente über Familienleben, Landwirtschaft und Schenken. Die Ölmalerei-Stil war damals extrem realistisch, wie ein Foto. Man sieht in Gemälde viele interesante Details von damals. Empfelenswert!

title: Rembrandt Bruegel Rubens Divinci Raphael Botticelli Giotto
text: Really enjoyed my visit to the old museum which has many works of art from the 14th to the 18th centuries. I was surprised to see Mona Lisa because I thought she was in the Louve but apparently she has some sisters in other museums. I was able to use a free headset and they were English explanations for some of the paintings.  Hours 8:10 AM to 6 PM it’s seven euros most days but on Sundays it’s only one euro. Visited during the week and it was not busy. Give yourself at least a couple of hours to go through this museum..

title: Magnificent collection of old masters
text: When I visit Munich, I always try to visit this gallery. The collection of Durer, Italian and German Renaissance artists, which is not often founds in other museums, is excellent here. Here you can see some interesting works by Leonardo da Vinci, Murilla also.

title: Arrogant English tour guide
text: The museum is quite impressive but I couldn’t enjoy it because of the arrogance of the English tour guide. He treated us like school children asking us questions nobody could possibly know the answer to and then scolding us for being wrong! This was an old man who clearly belongs to a different century. He kept on referring to some paintings as a “me too moment” when a character was a woman who was supposed to have been raped. He did this so many times that it was like he was mocking the idea of the me too movement. Get rid of him and your visitors will have a better time.

title: Interessante
text: La Vecchia Pinacoteca si trova nella zona dei musei di Monaco e consiglio di visitarla per la presenza di interessanti opere di artisti come Da Vinci, Canaletto, Duerer, Rubens e Rembrandt.Il museo si sviluppa su due piani ed è ben curato anche nella disposizione delle opere.Consiglio di trascorrere qui almeno due orette, ne vale la pena!La domenica il biglietto d'ingresso costa solo un euro.

title: Really Impressive Collection
text: Love visiting the Alte Pinakothek, the building itself is beautiful and the collection is really impressive. The Fall of the Damned by Rubens is a particular highlight. Entry is only one euro on a Sunday!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sunday visit to museum
text: It is worth visiting this galary to see collection of canvases of 14-18 centuries. Big collection of Durrer pictures.. On Sunday the entrance ticket costs 1EURO.

title: Художественная галерея
text: Имеет смысл покупать билет не только на постоянную экспозицию( 7 евро), но и выставку итальянских мастеров.

title: Must go place for the Munich trip
text: Fabulous and impressive art! To see the scale of works by Rubens and others. Nice to see influence on art made by Florentinians, who finally gave another topic to art besides annoying biblical topics! And all that for just 1 Eur! (unexpected special price on Sunday Feb2019)
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Museum
text: One of the finer museums in Munich.  You will enjoy a variety of exhibits and artifacts throughout this museum.

title: Beeindruckende Kunst; mäßiges TourGuide-System
text: Es braucht schon drei bis vier Stunden für einen Rundgang durch die Dauerausstellung. Auch Kunst-Laien kommen auf ihre Kosten und werden viel Interessantes über die Künstler und Werke erfahren. Leider ist das TourGuide-System (Sprach-/ Informationsinhalt; nicht die Technik) etwas altbacken. Das haben Florenz, Wien, Barcelona, London und Amsterdam in ihren großen Museen deutlich besser gelöst. Sonntags kostet der Eintritt in die Dauerausstellung nur 1€!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Содеожательно
text: Богатая коллекция картин, жемчужина: Автопортрет Альбрехта Дюрера! Много Пауля Рубенса, Ван Дюка, голландских мастеров, есть Рафаэль Санти. Определенно стоит посетить, два этажа и несколько часов погружения в искусство обеспечены.

title: Ein Juwel der Münchner Museumsszene
text: Seit dem Umbau und der Neupräsentation der Kostbarkeiten ein absolutes Muß.  Die altenMeister kommen in der jetzigen Präsentation noch schlüssiger zur Geltung. Man kann auch besser die Entwicklung der Epochen sehen und dann jeweils die herausragenden Meister und deren Meisterwerke begutachten. Didaktisch absolut gelungen

title: Не пожалеете
text: Я считаю, что каждый найдёт для себя зал, или полотно, который его воодушевит. Настолько разнообразное собрание, что просто нет возможности не заглядеться и не вникнуть в изображённое искусство. Размеры картин от самых маленьких, но ничем не уступающим, до самых внушающих работ.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: grande mostra da giotto a leonardo da vinci
text: ricca di pittori italiani. si presenta ben organizzata e accogliente. il capolavoro rimane l'autoritratto di Van Dyk. richiede almeno una giornata. all'interno vi è una caffetteria e un bokshop adeguato.

title: Muy grande, pero muy interesante
text: La audioguia está incluida con la entrada al museo. Es un edificio muy bonito y las salas están bien distribuidas.Merece mucho la pena la visita por su gran colección.

title: Unbedingt besuchen
text: Man sollte viel Zeit mitnehmen. Wir wollten eigentlich in die Sonderausstellung, sind dann aber zuerst in die Daueraustellung. Es empfiehlt sich mindestesn zwei Tage dafür zu veranschlagen. Ich konnte nach einer Stunde nichts mehr aufnehmen. Dabei ist die Ausstellung einmalig. Wir werden nochmal hin müssen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Must See
text: Tolle Sammlung an Rubens Gemälden und Malerei des 16 Jahrhunderts.Ein wunderschönes kleines Selbstporträt Rembrandts.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: ルネサンス期の作品は素晴らしい
text: ミュンヘン最終日にトラム27番に乗って訪れました。現地でノイエ・ピナコテークにも入れるコンビチケットを購入しました。最近まで数年に渡り改修工事が行われており、リニューアルを記念してアムステルダム国立美術館からフェルメールの「青衣の女」が来ていて、偶然見られてラッキーでした。こちらはルネサンス期の作品が充実しており、レオナルド・ダ・ヴィンチの「カーネーションの聖母」も普通に掲げられていました。あとルーベンスの作品も多数所蔵しており、ここに行くだけでもミュンヘンに行く理由づけになるのではないでしょうか？

title: Very impressing but better avoid Sundays
text: The museum has an amazing collection of paintings, even Dutch masters such as Rembrandt. As long as the Neue Pinakothek is closed for renovation (until 2025) and there is a popular exhibition (now there was the Florence exhibition) perhaps better avoid Sundays, if you don't mind missing the reduced entrance fee. We had to wait 30 minutes in line and the museum cafe seating options are limited. On Sundays the entrance for the regular collection is indeed only 1 euro but on other days it is also quite cheap. The Sunday 1 euro fee does not apply to the Florence or other temporal exhibitions.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Drei Generationen haben sich an einer Ausstellung erfreut.
text: Die Ausstellung über die Florentiner Meister war übersichtlich strukturiert und mit Audio guide sehr gut zu bewältigen. Drei Generationen erfreuten sich an der Darstellung der künstlerischen Kreativität der Stadt Florenz, die mit ihrem ökonomisch-politischen Aufstieg einherging. Also nicht nur eine Lektion in der sich immer wieder wandelnden Maltechnik sondern auch eine über die Geschichte der Stadt und ihrer rivalisierenden Machtzentren. Irgend wann endet das (in der Ausstellung abrupter als seinerzeit in Florenz) und man kann leider nur erahnen warum. Das ist das einzige, was mich ein wenig enttäuscht hat. Ansonsten habe ich viele neue Impressionen aber auch Wissen erworben. Die vielen Reisegruppen aus Italien sprechen Bände über die Strahlkraft dieser Ausstellung, die weit über die bayerischen Grenzen hinausreicht.

title: Одно из лучших в Европе собраний картин
text: Отличная коллекция этого музея включает немецкую, итальянскую, голландскую, фламандскую живопись, одну из самых ценных коллекций Рубенса. Три часа экскурсии с гидом пролетели как 20 минут :) Но не обязательно ходить так долго, четкие планы залов позволяют выбрать шедевры или направления, которые интересны лично Вам. Огромное удовольствие!

title: World famous
text: For art lovers a mandatory visit ; I say budget for 4 hours minimum, although you can easily spend the day Easy to get to and adequate café and restrooms

title: World-class collection
text: This is a world-class museum which also hosts great temporary exhibitions.We were lucky to see masterpieces of Renaissance artists of Florence from the collections all-over the world - one piece on loan from the British Queen!

title: Museo 01/01/2019
text: Ho visitato la pinacoteca il primo di gennaio direi luogo interessante e quadri di artisti molto conosciuti quali RUBENS ed il Canaletto.DA VISITARE con la guida

title: Exceptionel à ne pas manquer à Munich
text: C'est un endroit exceptionnel, très bien agencé par période, avec des œuvres éblouissantes et biens mise en valeur, Il faut prendre son temps tellement il y a tableaux de grands peintres.

title: Impresionante coleccion de arte de toda Europa
text: Un museo muy bien organizado que te permite conocer parte del inmenso patrimonio artistico europeo. Con el Louvre, la Pinacoteca de Brera, el Rijksmuseum y el Prado una de las excelencias continental.

title: Non usciresti più
text: Il fascino della pittura lo può capire solo chi ne è stregato...inutile fare carrellata di nomi...c'è da perdersi e da perdere anche un pò l'anima...non mancate di andarci

title: Imperdibile per fiamminghi e Rubens
text: Imperdibile per gli amanti della pittura fiamminga, di Rubens e non solo... Necessita di almeno di una mezza giornata per fare le cose  con calma, le sale sono parecchie e all'inizio non é immediato orientarsi. Imperdibili i continenti di Bruegel, il frammento di Bosch, i Cranach e vari altri quadri di artisti minori ma non meno interessanti (inclusa una copia della Gioconda)... Le sale di Rubens sono stupefacenti.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: обязательно нужно посетить
text: Если у вас осталось время в Мюнхене и вы уже посмотрели картины "Голубого рыцаря", тогда обязательно зайдите в старую пинакотеку, даже если вы не очень любите художников этой эпохи. (Новая пинакотека закрылась на очень длительный ремонт). Какие шедевры можно увидеть: Дюрер, Давинчи, Рубенс, Кранах и т.д. Собрание очень большое, вход стоит 7 евро и включает аудиогид, но не на русском языке, дети до 18 лет бесплатно.

title: Una struttura eccezionale
text: Una struttura espositiva con una distribuzione ed organizzazione che ti fa veramente apprezzare quanto esposto.Non basta una giornata. Ottima caffetteria in servizio e qualità per in sosta necessaria.Grande quantità di quadri, ma esposti con criterio (audio guida aiuta molto) e per tematiche o per provenienza. Apprezzata anche un sala con pittori bolognesi come Guido Reni : non consuetò.Ovviamente opere di tutti gli artisti più importanti non citabile : andateci. Over 65 a 5€ con audio guida
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: хороший музей в воскресенье за ОДИН евро
text: хорошее место с большим собранием старых мастеров. Весной добрая половина залов была на ремонте. Новая пинакотека мне больше по душе.

title: Definitely worthwhile
text: Good overview of the old masters and a phenomenal Rubens collection. The Neue Pinakothek was closed so really enjoyed this.

title: Florenz und seine Maler
text: Eine sehr empfehlenswerte Sonderausstellung mit vielen Besuchern. Wer kann, sollte sich die kleinere Variante in Augsburg ansehen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Per chi ama l'arte pittorica del XIV secolo
text: La struttura è molto bella, tuttavia il contenuto artistico è adatto a chi ama l'arte del XIV secolo: se non vi annoia ammirare una serie infinita di arte pittorica sacra, volti di personaggi illustri a quel tempo e scene di caccia, è il posto che fa per voi.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Arte sublime, pessima organizzazione
text: Nulla da dire sui capolavori, decisamente opere d'arte talmente grandi da non necessitare di commenti. Il prezzo per vederli è addirittura troppo basso. Alcuni quadri sono mal illuminati e posti troppo in alto per essere ben osservati.Pessima invece la gestione delle due code (una per entrare, una per fare il biglietto), per nulla coordinate e che creavano solo confusione. Una volta entrati nel palazzo, infatti, bisognava passare in mezzo alla fila di persone che attendevano di fare il biglietto per potersi mettere in fondo alla coda. Da un museo tedesco ci attendevamo una gestione decisamente più razionale del pubblico.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Evidemment incontournable !
text: Que dire de plus qui n'a pas déjà été dit ? C'est un des plus riches musées du monde, des chefs d'oeuvre dans tous les coins, et quand Rubens est votre peintre préféré, un grand bonheur. J'ai un (gros) faible pour "la chute des damnés", cet extraordinaire tableau à la composition incroyable, quasiment abstrait lorsque l'on prend un peu de recul. Pour un petit repos pour vos pieds au milieu de la visite, il y a une sympathique cafétéria très confortable où l'on peut déjeuner très correctement.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un discreto repertorio
text: Galleria che accoglie opere alternativamente di artisti locali e maestri europei, in un ambiente storico imponente. Piacevole visita anche senza l’audioguida a riempire di dettagli. Biglietto a 1€ tutte le domeniche.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: As expected
text: Know that the 1 Euro admission on Sundays (GREAT deal!) does not cover special exhibits. Still a fantastic opportunity though.

title: Da andare assolutamente
text: Ricca di opere di maestri piu' importanti, veramente molto belle, non grandissima e facile per muoversi. Vale assolutamente la pena andare.

title: Superb High Art Museum
text: The German masters alone—Duerer, Cranach, Altdorfer—are worth the price alone.  But then you have many Ruebens and the occasional Rembrandt or Van Der Weyden added to the mixed.  Glad we arrived early and had much of it to ourselves.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: とても見応えがあります
text: グーグルマップを頼りに行ったらかなり迷ってしまい大学の周辺をうろうろしてしまいましたが結果とてもわかりやすいところにありました。チケットを購入すると英語のガイドが無料で借りられます。美術の教科書で見た有名な絵などたくさん見応えのある絵が見れて満足です。

title: ゆっくり滞在するのに最適です
text: 平日、冬のみぞれ混じりの天候下に行きました。入場時にリストバンドを着けてもらい、入館します。好きな画家の絵を楽しみながら館内にあるカフェで休憩し、時間がゆっくりと流れる中で暖をとることができました。ルーベンスの作品が充実しています。

title: Un buen museo con obras muy importantes y que no se hace pesado.
text: La entrada a la exposición temporal y la entrada normal salen un poco caras, yo recomiendo visitar solo la exposición permantente, normalmente mucho más interesante. El museo es muy completo y resume la historia de la pintura del trecento al Sxix. Altamente recomendable.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: FLORENZ exhibit is GREAT!
text: The Florentine exhibit is most impressive. We also purchased the audio guide which was well worth the value as it provided many insights and thoughts for contemplation.  This is well worth the entrance fee of 11 or 12 euro!We attended on a Sunday and it was VERY busy, probably because the general admission on Sundays is 1 euro. The Florentine exhibit was most crowded, but the general admission area was not too bad.We stopped for coffee and cake between exhibits and highly recommend such a break! We did not purchase an audio guide for the general admission area because we intended to move more quickly.  We viewed all of both exhibit areas in approximately 5 hours.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bellissimo
text: La vecchia pinacoteca raccoglie opere di artisti di molte nazioni e ne espone solo una piccola parte. Comunque va visitato le opere esposte sono fantastiche
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Höhepunkte zum günstigen Preis
text: Die alte Pinakothek kann am Sonntag zum Preis von 1 € besichtigt werden. Das ist angesichts der Sammlung bedeutender Künstler sensationell. Man tut gut daran, am Anfang eine Auswahl zu treffen und sich sodann in der Betrachtung darauf zu konzentrieren. Sonst besteht die Gefahr einer "Reizüberflutung". Angesichts des Sonntagspreises fällt es auch finanziell leichter. Derzeit kann zudem die Ausstellung "Florenz"  besichtigt werden. Angesichts der Fülle des Dargebotenen empfiehlt sich auch an einer Führung teilzunehmen. Das alles ist allerdings nur zum "Normalpreis"  möglich, lohnt aber unbedingt. Nach solch einem Kunstgenuss sollte auf jeden Fall auch eine Stärkung in der sehr gut sortierten Cafeteria eingeplant werden.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 中央駅からすぐ近くです
text: 中央駅近くにホテルをとり、バスで２，３駅といった所。朝一番で行きました。荷物は後回しで、入場券？腕に巻くチケットを購入したほうがいいです。トイレは一階エントランスのみで、女子用は少ないです。天井が高いので、足に不安のある方はエレベーターをおすすめします。一点ごとの題はごく小さいプレートでした。中の職員に伺っても、観たい絵の位置は・・・　ルーベンスの大画面の前の警備員？は、親切にも絵と私を一緒に撮影してくれました。

title: Da non perdere
text: Una volta a Monaco è da inserire tra i primi luoghi da visitare e contemplare. È una delle Pinacoteche più importanti del mondo... vale assolutamente la pena “perdersi” al suo interno.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fine art museum
text: This is the museum that houses the older art collection of Munich....Great Italian and Dutch paintings....Easy to view and only costs one euro on Sunday...Do not miss!!!

title: Встреча с мастерами
text: Богатая экспозиция  старых мастером. На все времени не было. Знакомились выборочно, изучив коллекцию заранее: Леонардо да Винчи: Дюрер, Лукас Кранах, Буше, Рафаэль.

title: «Флоренция и её художники. От Джотто до Леонардо да Винчи»
text: В Старой Пинакотеке Мюнхена собраны около ста шедевров XV века. Экспозиция представляет художественные новшества, зародившиеся на родине Ренессанса, и произведения его культовых мастеров. Великолепные картины, скульптуры и рисунки дают многостороннее понимание концептуальных миров и методов работы этих художников. Уникальная возможность увидеть беспрецедентное разнообразие форм художественного выражения не только светских повествовательных сцен и портретов, но и для религиозных картин. Рекомендую к посещению!

title: １４から18世紀のヨーロッパ絵画の宝庫
text: ルーベンスの部屋が見どころとなっています。ティントレット、ティツィアーノ、ラファエロ、ダヴィンチ、レンブラント、ファンダイク、ムリリョを鑑賞できて幸せでした。アルテ、ピナコテーク。ノイエ、ピナコテーク。ピナコテーク、デア、モデル3つの美術館を年代順に巡る事をお勧めします。隣接しています。

title: Allein schon das Plakat zur Ausstellung ...!
text: Die Sonderausstellung "Florenz und seine Maler" ist genial: Die Präsentation der Gemälde und Skulpturen, die Lichtführung, die Beschreibung einzelner Gemälde, die einführenden Texte zu den Themen! Wer die Berichte zur Ausstellung in der Süddeutschen Zeitung Nr. 240 v. 18. Oktober 2018, Feuilleton, S. 9 sowie ebd. SZEXTRA , S. 1 sich vorher aneignet, hat noch mehr von der Ausstellung. Ein Audioguide ist anzuraten, ebenso frühe Ankunft um 10:00 Uhr. Der Katalog zur Ausstellung ist unbedingt empfehlenswert. Ermäßigte Eintrittspreise für Schüler, Studenten und Senioren (ab 65 Jahre).
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: GREAT MUSEUM OF OLD MASTERS
text: Good museum - we lucked out and Sunday was only 1 Euro admission.  Otherwise, a bit steep.  Heavy on religious paintings - perhaps almost 80% but many old masters.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Art lovers delight
text: This is one of the world's great art museums, with a treasure trove of Old Masters. Allow a minimum of 2 hours; then have lunch and visit the Neue Pinakothek.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Immer wieder ein Besuch wert
text: Immer wieder ein Besuch wert. Die derzeitige Sonderausstellung „Florenz und seine Maler” ganz besonders.

title: EIN MUSS
text: Ein absolutes Muss für jeden München Besucher. Highlicht sind natürlich die vielen Dürer und Cranachs, aber auch der El Greco.HAben hier wunderbare 3 Stunden verbracht.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 古い絵がある美術館
text: ピナコテークデアモデルネ、ノイエピナコテーク、アルテピナコテークの順でだんだん時代が古くなります。最後の方に展示されているルーベンスの大きな絵が印象に残っています。ノイエピナコテークの隣なので、一緒に回るといいと思います。

title: レンブラント、ルーベンスなど超有名作品を混雑なく鑑賞
text: トラム27番やバス100番で美術館前まで行けます。一日券が12€、５館共通チケットは29€なので時間があるのであれば共通チケットがお得だと思います。チケットとは別に各美術館で紙バンドが渡されるのでそれを見せれば当日中は出入り自由です。フラッシュなしであれば写真撮影も可能です。カフェとショップも併設しており便利です。2018年の年末から大規模改修工事に入るようで...ホームヘージに日本語もあるので詳しい情報はそちらで確認すると良いと思います。

title: Kunstexkus und florentinische Meisterwerke
text: Die derzeitige Sonderausstellung ist ein Genuss für Freunde der italienischen Kunst, insbesondere mit einer kompetenten Führung. Trotz der Enge der Räume im Erdgeschoss kann man hier viel über Arbeiten der Künstler und ihre Werke erfahren, die Ausstellung  ist ansprechend und aussagekräftig aufgebaut. Ein Audioguide ist empfehlenswert, denn damit wird plastisch die Werkstattatmosphäre im Florenz der Renaissance dargestellt.Natürlich ist alleine die recht weitläufige Hauptausstellung mit Werken von Dürer, Holbein, Rubens Canalette und vielen vielen anderen Künstlern wirklich sehenswert.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: worth a visit
text: If you like gallerys, this is for you. You need to allow most of a day this is not a place for a quick visit. Best of all go on Sunday the price is reduced.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Florenz verstehen
text: Die Sonderausstellung in der Alten  Pinakothek bringt eine tolle Erklärung der Zeit und der Kunst des 15. Jahrhunderts in Florenz. Wie wurde gemalt? Was wurde gemalt? Wer waren die Künstler, wer die Auftraggeber? Die Zeit von damals lebt wieder auf. Tolle Erläuterungen, ein wenig zu kleine Räume, aber absolut sehenswert.

title: Uno dei più antichi musei d'Europa
text: Un ampio museo ma non eccessivo, come le altre gallerie nazionali europee, dunque si può girare con calma e senza perdersi.I grandi maestri ci sono tutti, ma ovviamente la pittura fiamminga la fa da padrone. Rubens presente con alcuni veri capolavori, e non dimentichiamo il celeberrimo autoritratto di Durer.

title: Superbe
text: Très beau musée. On y retrouve des peintres Français, Italiens, Hollandais (Rubens), Allemands et leurs oeuvres.Beaucoup de tableaux des plus impressionnants, il y a même une copie de la Mona Lisa assez ressemblante. De vastes salles, de bonnes descriptions des pièces. Une visite qui vaut le détour

title: Sonderausstellung für "Italophile"
text: die Bilder geben die Zeit im alten Florenz wieder. Wenn möglich sollte man eine Führung mitmachen, damit man den Zeitgeist besser versteht. Auf jeden Fall ist die Sammlung unseres König Ludwigs vom Feinsten und zusammen mit den Leihgaben erst recht einen Besuch wert.

title: Even during renovations, a magnificent collection of art
text: I had read about how wonderful this museum of classical art was. We were not disappointed, even though we had paid "a king's ransom" to travel by taxi from the airport, in order to save time. There is a GREAT restaurant on the premises, and the Neue Pinakothek is just across the road.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Interessante Bildmotive
text: Wir waren Heute am späteren Nachmittag in diesem Museum. Am Dienstag hat das Museum sogar bis 20 uhr offen, auch wenn wir nicht so lange geblieben sind. Aus Zeitgründen haben wir nur die Dauerausstellung uns angeschaut. Diese war sehr interessant und bot viele Kunstwerke. Besonders meine Freundin hatte viel zu sehen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Hello Mona
text: THEY HAVE THE MONA LISA.I mean, I guess it's a copy that da Vinci did, but color me stunned because we walked into the room where she is and I had no idea she was going to be there and I basically freaked out. #museumnerdAmazing collection, great exhibits, beautiful building. A must visit!!

title: One of the Top European Museums
text: The famous art museum is well worth a trip to Munich if you want to see European Art: Dürer, Schongauer, Botticelli, Rafael, Rubens, van Dyck, Rembrandt, Boucher, and all the other big names before ca. 1760 A. D. (More recent artists are displayed in other Munich museums of same renown.) The Museum has been thouroghouly renovated for several years and recently reopened. For this reason, they have many curious visitors comming and it is recommend been there at the opening at 10 A.M. Extra bonus: the layout of the very large, over 260 year old museum is simple and visitors easily find the sections they are interested in.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ausgezeichnet
text: Eine ganz ausgezeichnete Sammlung gibt es in der Alten Pinakothek! Für einen verregneten Tag auch für Münchner eine gute Option, seine Freizeit zu gestalten.

title: Ein wunderbares Erlebnis
text: Es ist fast unmöglich alles an einem Tag zu geniessen, eine Mehr Tageskarte wäre zu empfehlen, wenn man mehr Zeit hat. In dem kleinen Garten kann man sich zwischendurch ausruhen.ist

title: Bellissima pinacoteca, da vedere per gli amanti dell'arte
text: Durante il nostro soggiorno a Monaco abbiamo abbinato giri turistici per la città e arte, scegliendo la Residenz e l'Alte Pinakotek, e non siamo rimasti delusi.La pinacoteca è una collezione di numerose opere, alcune meno note, altre più famose (autoritratto di Durer su tutte), con nomi quali Raffaello, Tiziano, Rubens, Van Dyck. Merita una visita sicuramente. Peccato solo per le didascalie in inglese assenti su un buon 60% di opere.

title: ゆったり見ることができるのでおススメです
text: 日曜日は1ユーロで見ることができ、旅行中この日しか来ることが出来ずやって来ました。お陰で得しました。まず入り口でチケットを購入すると手首に巻くタイプのチケット（うまく表現出来ずすみません）をつけてくれます。そしてちゃんとしたチケットもくれます。それからロッカールームで荷物を預け観覧開始です。ロッカーはお金を入れますが戻るタイプです。小銭を忘れずに。確か1ユーロか、2ユーロ。ロッカーの大きさにもよります。美術館はリュックはダメが基本ですが、こちらは女性のバッグも預ける様子。スマホだけ持ち観覧しました。手ぶらなのでゆったり見ることができました。美術館の周りもお散歩できるのでとてもおススメです。この日はミュンヘンマラソンの日で間近に皆さんの走る姿を見てとてもテンションが上がりました。日曜日なのに美術館が混んでいないというのも珍しいですが、いいですね。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Interesante
text: Un museo grande, pero no desproporcionado, que permite disfrutarlo con calma y sin perderte nada. Tiene algunas obras muy conocidas, y el precio es asequible.

title: Hat sich gelohnt
text: Im Rahmen der " Langen Nacht der Museen" waren wir hier und ich muß sagen, ich war sehr begeistert. Die BIlder sind auf jeden Fall sehenswert und der Aufenthalt war - auch wenn etwas überlaufen- auf jeden Fall zu kurz für mich. Unklar war mir allerdings, warum man seine Handtasche ab einer gewissen Größe - die dazu noch variabel ist?- nicht mit reinnehmen darf.

title: Huge collection of arts..
text: The layout makes the museum easy to walk through...its huge. wish more translations in English though...Sundays entrance are discounted so very worth visiting on sundays.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Not as good as we remembered, but a lot of renovations in progress
text: Some galleries were closed and we had to wander from one side to the other to see what was open. not as good or as well organised as the Neu Pinakotek across the park. This museum filled in the gaps we noted in the Dresden gallery as it had paintings by Leonardo da Vinci, Botticelli, Titian, Tintoretto, Hans Hals, Tiepolo and some French Masters. Still it filled the morning and was probably worthwhile.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Обязательно посетить
text: Здесь собраны мировые шедевры от средневековья и возрождения до барокко.Такие общеизвестные имена,как Леонардо,Дюрер,Босх,Питер Брейгель,Тициан,Эль Греко,Рубенс,Рембрандт.И не менее талантливые немецкие мастера Эльсхеймер,Ян Госсерт,Альбрехт Альтдорфер ...Все шедевры удобно расположены для обозрения в больших залах и маленьких кабинетах.Можно посидеть и почитать ,находящиеся здесь же книги о творчестве этих авторов,но не русском языке.Аудиогид на русском тоже отсутствует.По воскресеньям входной билет стоит 1€.

title: It worths to see
text: It is a very good program for a weekend. On Sundays, the ticket cost only 1 Euro. Prepare to pass one whole day there. Magnificent artwork. Great collection.

title: A ne pas manquer
text: Un des plus beaux musées d'Allemagne, avec une collection de peinture italienne de la Renaissance tout à fait remarquable

title: Musee de la peinture du 14 au 18 s
text: Magnifique musée. Rubens, velasquez et plein d autres.Tableaux extraordinaires de cette période.A voir absolument5 e pour les plus de 65 ans
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 絶対いくべし
text: Closeの部屋もあるし、これ見たかったのに、と思うこともあるでしょう。しかしとにかく見てくれ。誰が見ても、ほう、とうなるような絵がいっぱいです。絶対いくべし。欠点は、ときにガラスなのか、絵の地肌が出てないのが多々ある。地肌までみたかったな。

title: A treasure trove!
text: This museum has a fantastic collection of art, mostly German but not only, there is a room of Rubens, one of van Dyck, Canaletto.... and a terrific copy of the Mona Lisa in better condition than the original in the Louvre. Plan a couple of hours to get something out of your visit. ps Come on Sunday, Entrance is a symbolic 1 euro, incredible value!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Stará Pinakotéka
text: Jedno zo skvostov Mníchova je stará Pinakotéka. Obrazáreň, kde je čo vidieť. Rembrandt, Rubens, Tizian, Murillo, Dürrer, 17.-18. storočie ale aj Van Gogh a iné. To sa nedá na rýchlo opísať. Potrebujete na to tri hodiny. V nedeľu platíte len 1€. Keď máte možnosť vypočuť si vysvetlenie v istých hodinách, tak sa veľa dozviete.

title: a great place that offers sooo much
text: We only had the time to visit the permanent exhibition, so if you opt for the visit, do take the whole day. Waiting lines seem daunting at first but they actually moved quite fast so expect ten minutes or so and make sure you know which ticket you want to purchase. We spoke German but the guy at the counter was a bit stressed out and didn't want to help much so make sure to study the offer online beforehand. We decided spontaneously and kinda last minute  to visit the place so we basically walked through the 1-euro permanent exhibition hall but even that was well worth it. The permanent exhibition contained some amazing pieces by the Italian classics and classical themes from the Bible and the Classical Antiquity, a.k.a. the usual stuff but it was a welcome change from the Octoberfest atmosphere of the rest of the city. When I visit again, I will definitely come back to exlplore the place more thoroughly.

title: Exploring the best of Munich
text: Beautiful and vast collection of various old (and very old) paintings. Enormously satisfying but also quite tiresome - long halls, high walls, avalanche of information and emotions!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: מהנה מאוד
text: מוזיאון גדול ומרשים. יש בו יצירות אמנות קלאסיות רבות וביניהן ציורים רבים של רובנס. מומלץ מאוד לחובבי אמנות.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Prachtige Romeinse beelden
text: Dit museum is een must-see voor liefhebbers van Romeinse kunst. Er is een schitterende collectie beelden bijeengebracht waar je urenlang van kuntt genieten.

title: For art lovers and not only
text: The Alte Pinakothek exhibits paintings from the 14th till the 18th century. It´s a large exhibition where you can spend several hours. Worth every minutes.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sehr viele beeindruckende Gemälde
text: In der Alten Pinakothek bekommt man eine große Sammlung beeindruckender Gemälde zu sehen. Besondere Highlights sind  sicher die Werke von Da Vinci und die "Madame Pompadour" von Boucher. Und natürlich die Werke von Albrecht Dürer, Rubens, Tizian, und Botticelli. Die Räume sind angenehm groß und hell.Sehr schön ist auch das Museums-Café, in dem man nach dem Kultur-Genuß noch wunderbare kulinarische Genüsse bekommt. Die Kuchen und Torten sind sehr gut, man sitzt sehr stilvoll und gemütlich.

title: Splendide
text: Des chefs d’œuvre, partout et un bâtiment fonctionnel et superbe !! Si vous aimez la peinture européenne des maîtres anciens, précipitez-vous !!! C’est magnifique !!

title: art center
text: Alte Pinakothek is great place to spend the afternoon and watch the art collection of south germany its not that crowded

title: So much wonderful art, intelligently organized.
text: A wonderful place to spend 2-3 hours (with a good tea-room for a break). Almost every item is a masterpiece and moving from room to room chronologically gives you a fantastic education in how the art and culture evolved.

title: German Efficiency in the Art Museum
text: Pressed for time , I was able to see a lot , enjoy audio tour art commentary , meet a friend afterwards and relax at the Museum Cafe - with a German beer - Heavenly visit !The floor plan , arrangements , decor all allow many visitors to experience and understand complex themes from the Rennaisance and Enlightenment artists......I plan to visit the Neue (17/1800’s art) and Modernes separate buildings too......

title: Phenomenal collection in an imposing building offers it all
text: Bring your walking shoes for an art-lovers feast for the eyes and the soul.  Easily navigated.  There is a delightful cafe on the ground floor offering fun bavarian treats in case you need to take a break.

title: ヴィッテルスバッハ家の至宝
text: さすがミュンヘン、素晴らしい美術館です。デューラーの代表作をはじめ、美術の教科書に載っているレベルの作品が目白押し。ルーベンスもドラマティックな作品から、可愛らしい天使たちまで様々な作品を見ることができます。写真撮影可。それどころか、学芸員さんが「これはこの美術館でも最古の作品だ。写真撮らなくていいのか？」と声をかけてくれ、カバーを外してくれました。親切です。ピナコテーク３館あるので、抑えめでと思ったのですが、うんと時間をとってしまいました。

title: Classic Art
text: A beautiful Museum to admire the old masters. Very good selection and well-appointed rooms make this a superb museum.

title: German art and european impressionists. ANd great restaurant too
text: Alte Pinakothek has a lot of impressionists paintint. Besides, we were surprised about the amount of german painters, the curators made an splendid work!. AND you MUST go the the very fine restarurant at the basement!

title: Fantastische Kollektion von Kunstwerken
text: Eine tolle Sammlung von Kunstwerken, die stimmungsvoll in Szene gesetzt sind. Sofern man Zeit hat, sollte man unbedingt hier Station machen.

title: Amazing collection
text: We lost ourselves in the Alte Pinakothek for about 3.5 hours.  Great collection of Renaissance era works and Dutch Masters collections.  Very enjoyable time.

title: Un must
text: Un must pour les amoureux de peintures. Rubens et même DaVinci sont là...Personnellement, j'adore les primitifs et peintures sur bois et j'ai été comblé.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Отлично!
text: Просто удовольствие! Отличная галерея с первоклассными шедеврами. Можно ходить несколько дней и получать удовольствие!!!

title: Absorbing
text: A great place to slow down and relish art history. Helpful staff, lovely old building, a space to just appreciate art history.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ремонт
text: В здании идет ремонт, многие залы закрыты, часть картин отсутствует. Под большинством полотен убрали таблички с названием ( по английски). Русского аудиогида нет. Все это кардинально мешает восприятию. Стоит повременить с посещением до окончания ремонта (2019 г)

title: Typical art museum - just one of many in this huge museum district
text: German museums are highly specific and this one is for classical period. (They have separate museums nearby for impressionism, modern arts, Egyptian, Greek etc in walking distance). Rembrandt, Vermeer and many other great paintings seen here. Got a famous Rembrandt painting is on loan from Amsterdam to celebrate finishing of renovation in Alte Pinakothek. Take advantage of €1 fees in many museums on Sundays.

title: excellent collections overall
text: This is one of few museums one can see for only 1 e on Sundays. This is an excellent museum- it even has a Da Vinci, several Van Goghs, many Rubens, etc. There is also a Vermeer on loan that one an admire. You might want to come as the doors open at 10 am since it gets crowded and if you have a large bag it'll become hard to find a locker (carry 2 e coins for that). Also, the first fl galleries -lower galleries are strangely located past and through cafeteria.

title: Sehr beeindruckende Gemäldesammlung
text: Die Alte Pinakothek ist eine der schönsten Sammlungen klassischer Malerei - daher sollte man sie unbedingt besuchen, wenn man in München ist. Ist natürlich am Wochenende und an Feiertagen gerne sehr voll - daher besser versuchen, unter der Woche reinzugehen.

title: PflichtKulturpflicht
text: Ein Muss für jeden KunstInteressierten - sowohl das Objekt als auch der Geschichte. Wenn man die Zeit hat in München, ist der Besuch der Alten Pinakothek ein nachhaltiges Erlebnis.

title: muy lindo y con Girasoles!!
text: de vuelta de nuestro paseo por el Olimpia Park pasamos  por este museo, pero la sorpresa de encontrar una versión de los Girasoles de Van G fue indescriptible!!!BIEN!!

text: ミュンヘンの市街地の喧騒から離れた公園の中にある美術館。ヨーロッパの名画がそろい、静かに鑑賞できる。フェルメールの「手紙を読む青い服の女性」が来ていた。

title: Beautiful collection
text: This was a lovely collection of paintings, if you are a fan of art you will enjoy it. I went on Sunday and it only cost 1 euro, and since I got here early it was almost empty.

title: Travaux enfin terminés
text: Il y a deux ans la moitié des salles étaient fermées pour travaux. Les salles sont à nouveau ouverte et il y a du monde!L'occasion de voir une riche collection de primitifs flamands et de peintures italiennes mais aussi Rubens, Rembrandt, Poussin, Fragonard...C'est très beau.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Extraordinary
text: Beautiful museum with great restaurant. This was our secon visit and they still have great cakes. This is definitely must see

title: Scrigno di capolavori poco valorizzato
text: L'Alte Pinakothek è certamente una tappa obbligata, a Monaco. In questo scrigno troverete dei capolavori unici al mondo, dalle stupende tavole giottesche all'espressivo autoritratto di Dürer, dall'eterea Sacra Famiglia di Raffaello all'ironica "Cuccagna" di Bruegel, dal capolavoro manierista di Tiziano "Incoronazione di spine" all'esuberanza eccessiva di Rubens, fino alla spiritualità sofferta di Rembrandt. Peccato per alcuni punti a sfavore, che non valorizzano l'insieme: la scortesia del personale alle casse, la disposizione che non facilita il visitatore e la scarsezza del bookshop. Ciononostante, questa pinacoteca rimane uno dei più preziosi musei in Europa.

title: EIne Entdeckungsort
text: Ich leite Führungen in der Alte Pinakothek seit 1993. Das Gebäude hat mehrere Problemchen hier und da, aber die Kollektion ist sehr gut abgestimmt und ein Genuß für den Besucher

title: Meravigliosa
text: Era da tanto che volevamo andare alla Alte pinakothek e devo dire che e' stato un viaggio artistico meraviglioso attraverso i secoli partendo dal medioevo fino al settecento.Opere di Raffaello ,Rubens ,Durer ,Van Dyck e tanti altri ti avvolgono nelle grandi sale molto ben allestite.E' una delle pinacoteche piu' ricche del mondo molto ben organizzata e con audioguida compresa nel biglietto.Il famoso quadro di Boucher che ritrae M.me De Pompadour e' da sindome di stendhal
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Raffaello Botticelli Tiziano Tintoretto Giordano...una collezione italiana (e non solo) da vedere
text: È uno dei musei più ricchi d'Europa con 700 dipinti esposti (di oltre 14.000 custoditi). Artisti fiamminghi tedeschi ed italiani dal '400 al '700. L'edificio fu commissionato da Ludovico I e realizzato dall'architetto Von Klenze; i lavori durarono 10 anni, la grandezza delle sale fu calcolata sulla base delle opere che avrebbero ospitato. Emblematica al riguardo è la sala V al piano superiore: opere di Tintoretto gigantesche riposte su due file, da mozzare il fiato. Anche le sale numero VIII (opere di Rubens) e IX sono  fantastiche. Numerosi i capolavori italiani: di Luca Giordano e Guido Reni (sala X), di Raffaello e Leonardo (sala IV), di Tiziano e Veronese (sala V), del Parmigianino (sala 5 sempre al piano superiore), Mantegna (sala 4), Salvator Rosa e Bernardo Cavallino (sala 6). Imperdibile.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Tolle Gemäldegalerie mit alten Meistern
text: Unbedingt empfehlenswert bei einem München-Besuch, nicht nur für Kunstfreunde. Idee bei Schlechtwetter, statt draussen bei Nieselregen rumzulaufen. Weitere Alternative: Deutsches Museum an der Isar.

title: フェルメールのwoman in blue reading a letter
text: デューラーの四人の使徒やルーベンス、レンブラントの作品だを見ようと思い行ったのですが、思いがけずフェルメールが展示されていました。一点のみ、9月30日までの展示ですがミュンヘンに行く機会があれば是非ごらんになってください。静かに、じっくりと鑑賞できると思います。

title: Great collection
text: I went to visit several museums while in Munich and this one was my favorite. Not only had paintings from better known artists but a fine collection of them from lessor know ones in that time period. There was even a Vermeer on display.The price includes an audio guide (except on Sunday when the entrance price was reduced). A great value either way.If you have an interest in art then this is well worth your time.
